148b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos rim par phye ba gsum pa yin no/ /bkod pa mtha' yas/ de lta bas na nga'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas phyi
148b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang / chos 'di dag kun tu bsrung bar gnas pa dang / lus dang srog kyang
148b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang ste/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /bkod pa mtha' yas/ dper na/ ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nyi'i dkyil 'khor skar ma rnams kyis yongs
149a1(dkon brtsegs): su bskor ba ni shin tu lham me/ lhang nger 'dug go /de bzhin du gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa rim par phye bas yang dag par bsdus pa 'di yang
149a2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs shing snying por 'gyur la mdzes shing brjid pa yin no/ /'di dag thams cad ni gus pa chen pos spobs pa mtha' yas pa la nges par
149a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yin pas/ 'di la bag yod pa'i sa 'dod par bya'o/ /bag yod pa'i sa ji lta bu zhe na/ chos 'di dag la sems kyi las tshul bzhin du yongs su rtog pa'i yid la
149a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pas nges par sems pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa la rlom sems med pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa'i sa la
149a5(dkon brtsegs): slob par 'dod pa/ chos la mkhas par mngon par brtson pas/ chos 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par bya ste/ glegs bam la
149a6(dkon brtsegs): bris nas/ byang chub yang dag par zhugs pa'i don du gnyer zhing 'dun pa rnams la rab tu bstan par bya/ kun tu bgo bar bya zhing lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang /
149a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ger bri ba dang / don nges par bstan pa'i bar du yang chos yang dag par bgro ba la bcab pa med par chos kyi sgo ji ltar kun bzung ba bzhin mi mkhyud par bya'o/ /khyed sems
149b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa 'di dag thob par 'dod na/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa'i byang
149b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ni chos gang bsgrub par mi 'gyur ba dang / don gang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de cung zad kyang med de/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dir ma brjod pa de ni 'ga' yang med kyi/
149b3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa mtha' yas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos rim par phye ba 'di gzung zhig /de nas bcom ldan
149b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gzung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
149b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthus 'di bdag gis bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi sgo 'di dang ldan pa ni chos kyi sgo tshad med pa mngon du gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
149b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du gshegs pa'i mthus chos kyi sgo 'di la dad pa dang / chos kyi sgo 'di kun 'dzin pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams
149b7(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi sgo mang po mngon du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyi sa chos kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mang po mdzod 'di kun gzung zhig/ kun dga' bo/
150a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas 'khor 'di'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag chos kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'gyur te/
150a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi snang ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyi chos bstan pa yang mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yang nye bar 'gyur/ smon lam gyi rgyan ji lta
150a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dod pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin zab mo mtshan ma med pa dag ming dang mtshan mar brjod
150a4(dkon brtsegs): pas ston par mdzad pa la ltos/ chos kyi rang bzhin brjod cing lta ba rnam par dag pa sbyong bar mdzad kyang 'di la cung zad kyang ston pa med do/ /ston par byed pa yang 'ga' yang
150a5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi sgo 'di ni ye shes tshad med pa yang dag par brtson pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang mi skye
150a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa skyes la/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la
150a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang
150b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / spobs pa mtha' yas pa nyid la yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
150b2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag bkye ste/ 'od zer des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas
150b3(dkon brtsegs): nas| 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi le'u 'di thos par gyur to/ /thos nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
150b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams yongs su smin par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /
150b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog gi char yang bab par gyur to/ /'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
150b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di skad du/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces tshig tu smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mtha' yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
150b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas gzungs kyi rgyal po bstan pa
151a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ spobs pa tshad med pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /gzungs kyi phyag rgya sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud pa
151a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig / spobs pa mtha' yas/ 'di ni don thams cad yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo yin te/ des na chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /chos
151a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni nga'i rjes su ston pa yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das la me
151a4(dkon brtsegs): tog kha dog lnga pas mngon par gtor to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang /
151a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
151a6(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi
151a7(dkon brtsegs): lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya ta thA ga tA a tsi na t+ya gu h+ya ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
151b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
151b2(dkon brtsegs): lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
151b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa phal cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong
151b4(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bzod pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/
151b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non
151b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa'i sgrub pa shes pa/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la
151b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par rab tu zhugs pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags
152a1(dkon brtsegs): te bkur la rab tu bsngags pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par byang chub kyi lam mtha' yas pa mthar gtugs pa/
152a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa'i byams pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa/ chags pa'i gnas sgrib pa dang /
152a3(dkon brtsegs): chod pa dang / kun nas sdang ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ mthu bo che'i lus thob pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi tshugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/
152a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'jigs pa med par mkhas pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma mog mog por byed pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
152a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ /chos zab mo rnam par nges pa ye shes kyis ston pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la zhugs pas rtag pa dang chad par lta ba'i mtha' gnyis yongs su
152a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / ldang bar shes pa la mkhas pa/ phyogs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bcur sgra grags pa/ dam pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
152b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i tog dang / ri bong can gyi tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal
152b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpal brtsegs dang / dpal sbas dang / mthu bo che dang / klu dga' dang / klu'i bla ma dang / klus byin dang / gzugs 'dzin dang / mya ngan gyi lha dang / yon tan sgron ma'i rgyal po dang /
152b3(dkon brtsegs): lag na sgron ma dang / rtag tu lag 'degs dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / lag na rin po che dang / kun tu snang dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na
152b4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros chen po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mtha'
152b5(dkon brtsegs): yas rnam par gnon dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / nor gyi blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i
152b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros dang / rtag tu mos pa dang / rtag tu dgod cing rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dang / ngan song spong ba dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma
152b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i gzi brjid 'chang ba dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rtag par lta ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / lhun po
153a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / mi 'dzum pa dang / brjod med dang / rin chen dam pa dang / rin chen sems pa dang / legs par
153a2(dkon brtsegs): sems pa dang / don legs par rnam par bsams pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i blo gros dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / zhing
153a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par brgyan pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / phug sbas dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / tshangs pa dra ba can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od
153a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lag bzang dang / mig bzang dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang / seng ge'i tog dang / don 'grub blo gros dang / kha lo
153a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyur dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gang dag stong
153a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i dbang po'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod
153a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dbang che
153b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dbang che bar grags pa yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / chu lha dang /
153b2(dkon brtsegs): gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / gser mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshan bzang dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong phrag
153b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po
153b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan dang / thags bzang ris dang / lag bzang dang / sa la dang / ta la dang / bde mchog dang / rab sim dang / che rab dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gzhan dang /
153b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos
153b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ rang gi gnyen dang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
153b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge
154a1(dkon brtsegs): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba
154a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /sa bla na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i
154a3(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
154a4(dkon brtsegs): to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam
154a5(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par
154a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan
154a7(dkon brtsegs): dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
154b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong
154b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems
154b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi
154b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
154b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba'i tshogs
154b6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyis kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ /btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
154b7(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
155a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs ni byas pa'i las chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par 'gyur
155a2(dkon brtsegs): ro| |blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i tshogs ni/ lus dang tshor
155a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang sems dang chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
155a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /
155a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /
155a6(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa'i tshogs ni mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig
155a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par 'gyur ro/ /ston pa'i tshogs ni gzhan dag la rag ma las pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
155b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba'i tshogs ni ci rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chug par 'gyur ro/ /nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni ji skad thos pa'i chos chud mi gson par 'gyur ro//
155b3(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen
155b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos
155b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad do/ /tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
155b7(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems
156a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom
156a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
156a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi nang du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par
156a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni rnam par sgrub pa thams cad
156a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrub bo/ /ye shes kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
156a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni/ byang chub sems
156a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /ye shes kyi tshogs kyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis ni lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni bdud sdig can gyis thul bar dka'o/ /bdud kyi las
156b2(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
156b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad ston te mi 'chab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i
156b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring ba nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de bzhin
156b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas gang nyan thos dang / rangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa yang ma yin na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can tha mal lta smos kyang ci dgos pa las brtsams te/ khyod
156b6(dkon brtsegs): spobs par gyis shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang
156b7(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar khas blangs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa'
157a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
157a2(dkon brtsegs): p a'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spro
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba'i bdag po/ byang
157a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de/ khyod la ngas bskul gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba las brtsams
157a5(dkon brtsegs): te| 'khor 'dir spobs par gyis shig / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad
157a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mar me'i mthus
157b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gda' ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba
157b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems
157b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
157b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams thos nas mi dngangs/ mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor der legs par 'khod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis thams
157b5(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las bsam gyis mi khyab
157b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / glu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /yang grogs po dag /gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang
157b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkod de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin
158a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so/ /grogs po dag /de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de
158a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/ mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba
158a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan
158a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mos par gyur cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs
158a5(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i phyir shin tu
158a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
158a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems par gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho bo
158b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug 'dug na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'gyur ba'am/ lus tshul 'chos pa kho bos nam yang ma mthong ngo / /ngag 'gyur ba'am/ ngag
158b2(dkon brtsegs): gi kha gsag kyang ma thos/ sems 'gyur ba'am/ sems g.yo ba yang ma mthong ngo / /de lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ tshig tu ni mi smra'o/ /
158b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i lus kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mu med par snang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa/ byang
158b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa med par gnas so/ /'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bsam gtan
158b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod lam ston to/ /rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu dbyangs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi spyod lam dang / khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
158b6(dkon brtsegs): la khye'u'i spyod lam dang / bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang / bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bud med kyi spyod lam dang / skyes pas
158b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod lam dang / gzhon nus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gzhon nu'i spyod lam dang / bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar
159a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i spyod lam dang / rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang / yan lag ma tshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la
159a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag ma tshang ba'i spyod lam dang / gdol pa rkang lag chad pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lam dang / lkugs pa dang / 'phye bos
159a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dang / 'phye bo'i spyod lam dang / long ba dang / 'on pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ long ba dang / 'on pa'i spyod lam dang /
159a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rten dang / mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i spyod lam dang / lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ lha'i spyod
159a6(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ klu dang / gnod
159a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang / brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi spyod/
159b1(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang / 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang / 'khor los
159b2(dkon brtsegs): sgyur bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod lam dang / dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dge slong gi spyod lam dang / dge slong mas 'dul
159b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams la/ dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems
159b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la/ dge bsnyen ma'i spyod lam dang / nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi spyod lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/
159b5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang / byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can
159b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gzugs med pa ni ma gtogs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang spyod lam ji
159b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
160a1(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam ston mod kyi/ lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /lus kyis lus kyi las byed mod
160a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi| lus kyi dben pa yang mi 'dor ro/ /de lus yongs su dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed do/ /lus la mi lta bas sha
160a3(dkon brtsegs): za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gis lus las de dag la bstabs nas/ bdag srog dang phral te/ sems
160a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag la sbyin par byed do/ /khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do/ /rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do/ /gzi byin za ba rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed
160a5(dkon brtsegs): de| |zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar sha'i longs spyod ji snyed par de dag thams cad bdag gi lus las bstabs te/ srog dang phral nas sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do/ /de'i
160a6(dkon brtsegs): lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do/ /de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs
160a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu rig par 'gyur ro/ /de lus kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i
160b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ston te/ de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas/ byugs shing kun tu byugs te/ de dag
160b2(dkon brtsegs): pang du 'jog go / de dag skyes bu de dag gi pang du son pa dang / rnyis shing bskams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do/ /mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas/ skyes bu de dag des yid byung
160b3(dkon brtsegs): nas por te song ba dang / shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu 'byung
160b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |yang zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te/ sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'bru la bya ba de
160b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khebs par byed do/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me la lag pa'i sor mos g.yogs kyang de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus kyis sangs
160b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing rim gro byed de/ me tog gi gdugs ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi
160b7(dkon brtsegs): skon bu dag kyang 'thor ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod gcig
161a1(dkon brtsegs): tu mos te/ ri rab tsam gyi snying po 'bar bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gang+gA'i
161a2(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis
161a3(dkon brtsegs): bskus te/ mar mer 'bud do/ /de 'bar bar gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems can dag gis kyang mthong
161a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa de mthong nas kyang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
161a5(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed do/ /nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la yang bdag gis gzugs tshan po che chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag
161a6(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te/ der sems can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la chos kyang
161a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'dod do/ /gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b1(dkon brtsegs): des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus las 'das par ston to/ /der yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ci tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar phyin te/
161b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing / shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o/ /de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ni byang chub
161b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ shi ba'i lus la sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris
161b4(dkon brtsegs): su skye ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig /ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa 'grub/ 'dod pa grub/ smon
161b5(dkon brtsegs): pa grub po/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis ci ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sngon byung
161b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa nam mkhas bskor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste/ de na grong dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod
161b7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nad chen po'i bskal pa par ma byung ste/ der sems can dag
162a1(dkon brtsegs): nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas/ phal cher lus shu ba can dang / lus rnags pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dbal dang / thor bu
162a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyi nad rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur
162a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang | sems can de dag gi nad de bsal bar ma nus so/ /der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i spyad ma rnyed de skyabs med rten med nas 'di skad du/ nad 'di las ni thar byed
162a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |lha'am klu'am dri za'am/ /gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung / /mi ma yin pa su zhig yod/ /sdug bsngal 'di las thar byed pa/ /de la nor rnams thams cad btang / /rjes
162a5(dkon brtsegs): su bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya/ /zhes ku co cher 'don to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang
162a6(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin mig bzang zhes bya bar gyur te/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa yang mthong / lha'i rna
162a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas ku co chen po 'don pa'i sgra yang thos so/ /des de dag mthong zhing thos nas kyang / snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas
162b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas des de ma thag tu
162b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na/ grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu srog chags des pa zhes bya bar rdzus te skyes nas/ steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/
162b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba/ ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na/ srog chags des pa zhes bya yod/ /de yi sha la sus zos pa/ /de ni nad las thar par
162b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par/ /ji ltar 'dod par de yi sha long zhig /de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med/ /'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no/ /zhi
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ grong khyer chen po ku ru
162b6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags des pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ des pas
162b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing / /bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba/ /bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha/ /'dir ni
163a1(dkon brtsegs): nam yang zad par ma gyur cig / zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na phyogs bzhi'i sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa'i
163a2(dkon brtsegs): lus la sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ yang bcad/ yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar sems
163a3(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ nad med cing bde ba dang / nyams pa med par gyur to/ /de nas
163a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi nad thams cad bsal bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas 'dzam bu gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag
163a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar cing nad med par byas te/ bde zhing nyams pa med par byas kyi/ bdag cag gis de
163a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i gnas shig bya'o snyam nas de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa
163a7(dkon brtsegs): des pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs/ /khyod ni bdag cag sman pa sman/ /khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba/ /khyod kyis bdag cag bka'
163b1(dkon brtsegs): stsol cig / de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa des pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag brgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/
163b2(dkon brtsegs): nga la nor dang zas skom dang / /gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med/ /thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni/ /dge ba bcu yi las lam srungs/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang
163b3(dkon brtsegs): chub smon lam brtan pa thob/ /phan pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems/ /gcig la gcig kyang byams pa skyed/ /brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos/ /sems can de dag rab dga' ste/ /shin tu
163b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yi/ /dge ba bcu yi las lam blangs/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de tshud chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de snyed las tha na
163b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song ba mi dran no/ /de tshun chad de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang / bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa
163b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ de dag yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang
163b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par gzengs bstod nas/ de la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
164a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba rnam par dag go / zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar lus
164a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig yongs su btang bas na/ sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so/ /gzhan yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi
164a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mi shigs pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ rdzus te skye ba ste/ lus de ni 'jig pas
164a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jig go / lus mi 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir thams cad kyis thams cad du
164a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jig ste/ mes mi tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs shing dngos po rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan te mi shigs pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems
164a6(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi sems mi rtog ste/ lus la lus kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis
164a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid shes so/ /lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyis su mi byed de/ lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
164b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug go /de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams
164b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par byed do/ /de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
164b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid du shes so/ /chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rjes su 'thob
164b4(dkon brtsegs): bo| |de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid
164b5(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ /de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so/ /
164b6(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal
164b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /phung po dang / khams dang /
165a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
165a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du
165a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
165a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang / de lta bu nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / mi 'byung ba nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid dang / gzugs
165a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de/ gzugs med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad
165a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de bzhin nyid gzugs su mi byed do/ /de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang
165a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go /de bzhin gshegs
165b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gi lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go / lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas lus thams cad ni lus med par yang dag par mthong ngo / /lus thams
165b2(dkon brtsegs): cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rab tu shes so/ /shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrub bo/ /de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te/ phung po
165b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | khams dang / skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no/ /de chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas na mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /thos pa dang / reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don
165b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus te/ rtsi'i shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa
165b5(dkon brtsegs): legs par byas te/ legs par zin cing legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /der
165b6(dkon brtsegs): nad pa gang btsun pa'am/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am/ rgyal po'i bu'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ blon po'am/ rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i
165b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad nas/ de dag phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde la/ nyams pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang sman pa
166a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba'i shes pa la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
166a2(dkon brtsegs): skus rab tu phye ba yang sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis lus
166a3(dkon brtsegs): la reg na reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lus yongs su gdung ba dang bral bar yang shes so/ /de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi
166a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems
166a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin/ kham gyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de zas thams cad yongs su shes pa dang
166a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o/ /de zas za'ang mid pa ma yin/ za'ang khong du 'jug par mi byed do/ /chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams
166a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba med kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang
166b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba yang ston to/ /de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu shes so/ /'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med
166b2(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu shes so/ /skye yang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu shes so/ /de chos kyi sku dang ldan/ chos kyi zas dang ldan/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing chos la rton pas/ de
166b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i sku/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las bye
166b4(dkon brtsegs): brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku/ dpe med pa/ 'dra ba med pa/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
166b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel ba'i sku/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ stong pa nyid
166b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la nges par btags pa'i sku/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i nam mkha' khyab pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sku/ mtha' yas mu
166b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sku/ 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku/ mi g.yo zhing rlom sems med pa'i sku/ gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin
167a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i sku/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/ sa'i khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/
167a2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams kyis ma yin/ me'i khams kyis ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ ma byung ba/ kun nas ma byung ba'o/ /'byung ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin
167a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |'byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /mig las ma byung ba'o/ /rna ba la mi gnas pa'o/ /snas shes par bya ba ma
167a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'o/ /lces rab tu ma phye ba'o/ /lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o/ /yid kyis nye bar sprad pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems dang mi 'jug pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug/
167a5(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog /rjes su mi 'jug pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni de 'dra'o/ /de las byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob
167a6(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling bzhi pa'ang rung / 'dzam bu'i gling yang rung / grong
167a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor de ji snyed yod pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar yang byed la/ bdud thams cad
167b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de mthong bar yang byed la mthong bar snang ba yang med do/ /mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar snang ngo / /mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs
167b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba yang ma yin no/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bas rab tu phye ba yin yang / lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa las kyang mi nyams
167b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi nyams so/ /de lus mi rtag pa dang / lus sdug bsngal ba dang / lus bdag med par yang sems can rnams la ston la/ lus kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /de
167b4(dkon brtsegs): lus rab tu dbye ba yang sems can rnams la ston la/ rgyu gang dang dmigs pa gang dag gis lus mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa po med pa
167b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | tshor ba po med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /lus rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes shing / de lus kyi las yongs su
167b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par yang sems can rnams la ston te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las
167b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par bstan to/ /
168a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad
168a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /des pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //bam po gnyis
168a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang
168a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed do/ /byang chub
168a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs ji snyed par sgra la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do/ /sems can de dag gi sgra brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang /
168a6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye
168a7(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ tha na srin bu dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang ma dang / phye ma leb kyi sgra dag la'ang ye shes mthong ba 'jug go /sgra'i rnam par
168b1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta bus sems can de dag gi lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa byang chub
168b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo / /'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /ji ltar sems can mtha' ma gang yang med/ /de ltar skyes pa'i rabs te dpag
168b3(dkon brtsegs): tu med/ /bskal pa brgya snyed bshad kyang mtha' ma med/ /bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya/ /skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che ba'i tshig /sems dang bsam pa rgya cher rab
168b4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur gang med bri med pa/ /'on kyang dpe don ldan pa bshad par bya/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
168b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
168b6(dkon brtsegs): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed
168b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ma smad tshig /gang pa med cing bri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag /de dag
169a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rnams la nan tan nyon/ /byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang / /dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de/ /tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i
169a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra phyung bas/ /legs bshad des ni tshangs pa tshim par byed/ /gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid 'ong sgra/ /de dag de yi sgra brjod zil gyis non/ /rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni//
169a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung / /mi'am ci yi sgra dag gang yod pa/ /de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshogs/ /de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de/ /de yi tshig
169a4(dkon brtsegs): gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pas/ /rol mo'i sgra dang lha yi sgra mang po/ /chos kyi don sbyor dge bar ldan pa yi/ /de yi tshig gis kun du
169a5(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed/ /mi yi 'dren pa yi ni tshig thos nas/ /'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi/ /gti mug g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi/ /don rnams gtan la phebs shing the
169a6(dkon brtsegs): tshom med/ /gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang gnas pa/ /de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed/ /mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur zhes byang
169a7(dkon brtsegs): chub tshol/ /klu dbang dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyi/ /rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ /thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed//
169b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam gling 'di na tha dad phyogs rnams su/ /kun nas sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi/ /de yi skad kyi rnam par bsgrags gyur na/ /de thos mi rnams thar pa rjes su thob/ /sa bla'i lha
169b2(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin bar snang lha/ /de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug /rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o/ /ngang pa khrung khrung ka la ping ka dang / /rma
169b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ne tso khu byug shang shang te'u/ /ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun/ /ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed/ /stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spre'u/ /gzig dang byi la ri dwags
169b4(dkon brtsegs): glang chen bse/ /rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun/ /ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed/ /gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang / /rkang mang dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams//
169b5(dkon brtsegs): bskul dang chad pas bcad dang phan gdags phyir/ /kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug /sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na/ /rab bam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma'am/ /dmyal
169b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dud 'gro'i gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / /lha mi rnams dang de ni skad kyang mthun/ /ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni/ /mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med/ /mtshan
169b7(dkon brtsegs): ma med cing 'dzin med 'ching ba med/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sems ni 'khrug pa med/ /dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na yang / /de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni/ /
170a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong du yang / /gang+gA'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed/ /stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa/ /de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra
170a2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ /chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor du/ /thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed/ /sems can gang dag rab tu sma 'dod dang / /nga rgyal zil gnon su la'ang mi
170a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dud pa/ /de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas/ /thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed/ /'on pa glen pa dag dang lce med dang / /dig pa rnams dang gang dag skad 'dzer
170a4(dkon brtsegs): ba| |de dag de yi legs smras snyan thos nas/ /sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par byed/ /nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir ba dang / /nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris
170a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams/ /de dag de yis dge tshig dag thos nas/ /'gyod pa brtul bar gyur cing bsil bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra/ /mi rtag sgra thos nas ni sems
170a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams/ /sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros rtsom par byed/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa/ /mtha' yas

170b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'am/ sdang ba'am/ rmongs pa'am/ nyon mongs pa'am/ thogs pa'am/ nye bar thogs pa'am/ dman pa'am/ rab tu dman pa'am/ brlang ba'am/ zher 'debs

170b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa'am/ tshig dang bam yin pa'am/ rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa'am/ 'byor pa'i tshig ma yin pa'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin
171a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gam/ gzhogs 'drid zer ba'am/ chos dang mi ldan pa'am/ 'gal ba'am/ gnod pa'am/ dus las yol ba'am/ tshod las 'da'
171a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ lung bstan pa la thogs pa'am/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang ldan pa'am/ rnyed pas rnyed par 'dod pa'i tshig gam/ 'byung ba ma yin pa ston pa'am/ mig
171a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul par 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'am/ som nyi'i tshig gam/ sdug par byed pa'i tshig gam/ mi sdug cing gnad du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ khyad du gsod
171a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gam/ rang gi phyogs bstan pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi phyogs tshar gcad pa'i tshig gam/ bdag bstod pa la rjes su chags pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi bstod pa
171a5(dkon brtsegs): la bar du gcod pa'i tshig smra ba'am/ thing slad dam/ gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig gam/ gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ gsang brtol
171a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig gam/ ngag bsrungs pa ma yin pa'i tshig gam/ mkhas pas smad pa'i tshig gam/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ brlang 'debs pa'i tshig gam/
171a7(dkon brtsegs): ngor mngon du bstod pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyis nyes pa dus ma yin par gleng ba'i tshig gam/ zug rngus gnad du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa kun brjod pa'i
171b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed pa'i tshig gam/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brda sprod pa'i tshig gam/ las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin
171b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig mi 'byin to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu grub
171b3(dkon brtsegs): pas bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no/ /gal te de shing drung na 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ 'dug gam/ nyal kyang rung / la la
171b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'ongs nas/ kye skyes bu shing ljon pa 'di dag la 'dab ma ji snyed cig yod ces zer na/ de shing ljon pa de la yang mi blta/ 'dab ma la yang mi bgrang bar shing ljon pa de la
171b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa bzhin du mi nyung mi mang bar 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ngo / /yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i 'bru de brgya phrag ji snyed cig yod/
171b6(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag ji snyed cig yod/ 'bum phrag ji snyed cig yod/ bye ba phrag ji snyed cig yod/ ther 'bum phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khrag khrig phrag ji snyed cig yod/ dkrigs phrag ji
171b7(dkon brtsegs): snyad cig yod/ gtam phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khyad phyin ji snyed cig yod/ mi 'khrugs pa ji snyed cig yod/ dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig yod/ grangs med pa ji snyed cig yod/
172a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa ji snyed cig yod/ phyin byed phrag ji snyed cig yod/ stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ glang po che'i stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ bgrang ba
172a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag ji snyed cig yod ces 'dri na/ de bye ma de dag la'ang mi blta/ mi bgrang bar bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa bzhin du 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag
172a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ bye ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis 'di snyed cig yod do zhes mkhyen pa yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mngon sum du gyur
172a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma gtogs pa lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ rlung lha'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ nyan thos sam/
172a5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum ni ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na drang srong snang ba zhes bya
172a6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig byung ste/ de'i dus na bram ze sngo sangs zhes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo / /yang de'i dus na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yal ga dang / 'dab ma mang pos yog pa/ khor
172a7(dkon brtsegs): khor yug tu tshad rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/ der drang srong snang ba de gnas so/ /de na gnas pa'i tshe des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po
172b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po de'i yal ga grangs du yod pa lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyi bar du bgrangs te/ rtogs par byas/ shes par byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze sngo sangs zhes bya ba
172b2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/ des zas kyi bya ba byas te/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba ga la
172b3(dkon brtsegs): ba der song nas mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas drang srong snang
172b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya bas bram ze sngo sangs zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye bram ze/ mi'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na gang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod
172b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsi ba'am/ rtogs par byed pa'am/ shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa/ mchis so/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ bram ze de/ gang yin/ bram zes
172b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ kye bram ze/ de'i phyir ba grongs shig /de nas bram ze sngo sangs de shing ljon pa de la yang mi lta/ 'dab ma
172b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang mi bgrang bar skad cig la 'dab ma rtogs pa la zhugs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mi 'khrugs drug cu pang steng phrag /bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin
173a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag / bcu gsum dag dang dkrigs pa phrag /dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig phrag /sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag /sum cu dang ni ther 'bum phrag /brgyad
173a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dang yang bye ba phrag / dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis/ /bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal/ /de skad thos nas sngo sangs la/ /snang bas smras pa bram ze'i mchog /khyod ni
173a3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshig smra ba/ /legs so legs so 'dir bden no/ /lo ni khyud khor bcu gnyis dang / nyi ma bdun du mngon shes kyis/ /'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs/ /gtso
173a4(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen/ /khyod ni gzigs pa mi mdzad cing / /bgrang ba mi mdzad skad cig tu/ /'dab ma rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs/ /mkhyen 'di nyid kyi'am lha yis bstan//
173a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs/ /sngo sangs kyis smras pa/ /kye btsun pa/ gson cig /'di ni lha yis smras min mi yi ste/ /bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug /
173a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' zad pa grum par 'gyur srid kyi/ /kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi srid do/ /snang bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shA ri'i bu/ bram ze sngo sangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste/ /yon
173a7(dkon brtsegs): tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra/ /bde la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa yin/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag yongs su dag pa
173b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par zad kyi/ de bas gong du bstan na byang chub sems dpa'i
173b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag yongs su dag pa tshad zin pa'am/ mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// //gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i
173b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs
173b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams mi byed do/ /mngon par shes
173b5(dkon brtsegs): pa las kyang ma nyams la/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang byed do/ /mngon par shes pas kyang rnam par rtsen la/ bya ba thams cad kyang ston to/ /mngon par shes pa la yang
173b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la yang gnas so/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de dag ni ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes
173b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de dag gi

174a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la blta ba dang / sems
174a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog cing blta ba'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni bskal pa mtha' yas pa rjes su dran pa dang / mngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma

174a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa zad pa'i rjes su mthun pa dang / dus la blta zhing dus las mi yol ba'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa 'phags
174a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i des par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o//
174a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni don zab cing / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos
174b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mchog yin no/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mthun pa'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes
174b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni

174b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / legs par sbyangs pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog kyang / shin tu zad pa dang /
174b5(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba nyid du ltung ba yang ma yin/ /bsam bzhin du yang 'dir skye la/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'khrugs pa yang med pa/ bcings pa bzhin du skye ba yang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba
174b6(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ /bcings bzhin du 'byung ba yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las grol ba'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol
174b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa las grol ba'o/ /des na grol bzhin du skye'o/ /grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho'o/ /grol bzhin du 'byung ngo / /de skye yang theg pa chen po las
175a1(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis kyang phun sum tshogs so/ /phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongs su tshol yang mi

175b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i
176a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gsang ba ni/ gang byams pa yang yin la bdag med pa nyid kyang yin/ snying rje yang yin la sems can med pa nyid kyang yin/ dga' ba yang
176a2(dkon brtsegs): yin la srog med pa nyid kyang yin/ btang snyoms kyang yin la/ gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin/ sbyin pa yang yin la sems dul ba nyid kyang yin/ tshul khrims kyang yin la sems

176a4(dkon brtsegs): sems pa nyid kyang yin/ /shes rab kyang yin la rgyu ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang yin la dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang

176a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yin la chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la lhun gyis grub pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa yang yin la rang 'byung gi sems nyid
176a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyi dbang po yang yin la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dbang po rnams

176b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang yin la rjes su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa la yang yin la shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas yid
