176b5(dkon brtsegs): yang yin la mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la bzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang yin
176b6(dkon brtsegs): la| chos kyi dbyings dang / dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yin la/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ mi skye ba'i chos
176b7(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa yang yin la/ mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang yin la ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ mtshan rab tu thob pa yang
177a1(dkon brtsegs): yin la mtshan ma med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan nyid kyang yin la khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid kyang yin/ bdud
177a2(dkon brtsegs): tshar gcod pa yang yin la sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyang yin la chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems
177a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yin la mi 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin
177a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o/ /
177a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par rtogs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang chub kyi sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /
177a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar gyur ba yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
177a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /
177b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag/ sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags las/ stong phrag bdun khri
177b2(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog
177b3(dkon brtsegs): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
177b4(dkon brtsegs): grol lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /steng
177b5(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char mngon par bab po/ /ma bskyod par sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra stong snyed rab tu grags par gyur te/ sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra de dag las
177b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan
177b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /de dag
178a1(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o/ /sems can de dag ni
178a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/ sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i sems
178a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi
178a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thos lags te/ 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba de su'i mthu
178a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ldan zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs
178a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba
178a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos mnyan pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag la
178b1(dkon brtsegs): yang blta ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba de lus mi snang bar steng gi bar snang la gnas
178b2(dkon brtsegs): nas| nga dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog char mngon par 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra yang rab tu phyung nas/ sil snyan dang / rol
178b3(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sgra de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon par/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes
178b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom
178b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung
178b6(dkon brtsegs): ngam| bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /yang bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag
178b7(dkon brtsegs): pos bstan pa chen po 'di bstan to zhes gsung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa thob par rngo thogs lags sam/ de nas bcom
179a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod legs par 'ongs so/ /khyod 'dir
179a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang ba pa'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro/ /sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa 'ongs
179a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba
179a4(dkon brtsegs): gang du bskyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la 'dis bsnyen bskur byas/ 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btab na/ gang phyir 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan
179a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal
179a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| zhi ba'i blo gros/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya chen po tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med par
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
179b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
179b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa/
179b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa/ rtswa dag der skyes pa yang 'jam po/ gos
179b4(dkon brtsegs): ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar sngo zhing g.yung drung 'khyil bar g.yas su 'khyil ba kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba/ gom pa bor na sor
179b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi thur du dma' ba/ rkang pa bteg na sor bzhi gyen du mthob/ ha cang yang mi grang / ha cang mi tsha ba'i rlung chung ngu bsil ba 'dod pa dang mthun par ldang ba'o/ /sa chen po de yang
179b6(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya sngon pos brgyan pa'o/ /sems can de rnams kyang rnam pa bzang zhing mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba/ nyon mongs pa thams
179b7(dkon brtsegs): cad chung ba/ legs par bshad pa'i don kun shes par byed nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa sha stag go /bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de
180a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khrag khrig bcu gnyis yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag sum cu
180a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis yod do/ /de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug thub bo/ /mi rnams kyang dus ma yin par glo bur bu 'chi ba med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par
180a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten par ma rab tu 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba/ rab tu lo legs pa/ yangs shing tha gru che
180a4(dkon brtsegs): ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa re re yang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong par gyur te/ der grong khyer chen po yang bar bar na dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ grong dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod
180a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gis bskor ba byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gling bzhi pa mdzes par snang ba de'i dbus na pho brang grong khyer rnam par dag pa can zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ byang dang lhor ni dpag
180a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi/ shar dang nub tu ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ skyed mos tshal khris rab tu brgyan pa/ grong dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod khris kun nas bskor ba
180a7(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can zhes bya ba der/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ gling
180b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa la dbang ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
180b2(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa zhig byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi grong khyer gyi dbus na khang pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ chu zhing du dpag tshad bcu drug yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim
180b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang / rta babs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba brtsigs so/ /ra ba'i nang na skyed mos tshal chen po bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog sna tshogs zhes
180b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i skyed mos tshal chen po dang / yon tan gyis mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / rma byas mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dus kyi bde ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rdzing khyon dpag tshad phyed
180b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che'i kha khyer gyis kun nas bskor ba/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma'i 'bab stegs can/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ rin
180b6(dkon brtsegs): po che'i pad mas kun nas khebs pa/ ngang pa dang / chu skyar dang / bya gag dang / ngur ba dag sgra 'byin pa bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /
180b7(dkon brtsegs): spos mchog ces bya ba dang / chu rgyun rjes su 'bab pa zhes bya ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor bdun 'bum yod de/ thams cad kyang mtshan dang ldan
181a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i na chung bud med rin po che'i longs spyod dang 'dra ba sha stag go / de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
181a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa dag go / de la bu stong du tshang ba yod de/ dpa' ba/ brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/
181a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa sha stag go /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus
181a4(dkon brtsegs): n a| bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rten cing bzhugs
181a5(dkon brtsegs): te| rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong brdal ba dang / yul 'khor gyi mis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/
181a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
181a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu lo bye ba tshang bar yid du 'ong ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / na bza' dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa'i longs spyod kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ dge slong re
181b1(dkon brtsegs): re la yang rim gro pa dang / spyod pa'i phyir g.yog gsum gsum phul lo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la bsti stang bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar mos
181b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos nyan pa don du gnyer bas bag yod par gyur te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer ro/ /de dag bag yod cing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / sems kyis nges par sems pas
181b3(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to/ /de dag bskyed nas steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / grong khyer nas
181b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus nas tshong 'dus dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mthar gyis rgyu zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya
181b5(dkon brtsegs): lam rnyed par 'gyur/ /mir skye ba yang shin tu dka' bas rnyed/ /grogs po gang dag dad dang chos mnyan pa/ 'di 'dra bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed par dka'/ /mi dbang rgyal po de ni da
181b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ /rab tu zhi bar 'gro ba'i chos ston gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du myur du deng / /chos thos nas ni bde 'gror 'gro bar gyis/ /chos thos pas ni ngan 'gro rnam par spong / /
181b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thos pas ni bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chos thos pas ni nyon mongs rnams kyang zhi/ /bsil ba'i dngos po dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /de dag tshigs bcad 'di dag rab brjod
182a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha rnams a la la zhes lan brgya smras/ /lha yi me tog yid 'ong char du bab/ /ston pa blta phyir gang
182a2(dkon brtsegs): dag bskul ba rnams/ /rkang gnyis mchog gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de dag thal sbyar gus bcas 'khor gyur pa/ /de dag bgrang las dpag par mi nus so/ /rgyal bas de dag rnams
182a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam mkhyen nas/ /de dang mthun pa'i chos ni rab tu bshad/ /bde bar gshegs las chos thos bye ba phrag /sum cu rtsa drug byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /bye ba brgya phrag gsum tshang
182a4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyung ba/ /de dag chos mchog mig ni rnam par dag /srid pa kun tu yid byung sems gyur na/ /de dag der ni bstan 'dir rab tu byung / /gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig de nyid du/ /
182a5(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa bzung zhing de bzhin gso sbyong blangs/ /ston la mchod pa byas shing chos mnyan nas/ /de dag slar yang rang gi gnas su dong / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar rgyal bu gzhon du
182a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis pha yul 'khor srung la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ rgya che zhing yangs pa'i bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ ba
182a7(dkon brtsegs): gam dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / rta babs dang / kha khyer gyis bskor ba zhig byas te/ 'dzam bu'i gling ril gyis kyang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po srang phyed kyi rin du mi chog
182b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod pa rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/
182b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig byas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung de/ nam bcom ldan 'das nyid la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya

182b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der zhugs nas pad+ma'i bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ bla mar bya ba chen po dang / bsti stang dang / ri mor bya ba dang / me tog dang /

182b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs len pa'i mchod pa dam pa dang bcas nas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de ni rin po che'i dra bas rab tu g.yogs te/ thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas khang ba brtsegs pa de sprul te/ steng
182b7(dkon brtsegs): g i nam mkha' bar snang la ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dong nas phyin pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de sa la bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong gi
183a2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ /rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gnyen gyi 'khor kyang khang pa brtsegs

183a5(dkon brtsegs): tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal pos/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs par mkhyen nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/
183a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te/ rgyal po chen

183b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o| |rgyal po chen po/ chos bzhi po 'di dag ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams 'gyod pa med pa dang / bag yod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzhi gang
183b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ dbang po sdom pa dang / 'dod pa rnams la skyon du blta ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / chos la nges par sems pa ni srog gi dbang
184a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i dam pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ chos bzhi po de dag ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams 'gyod pa med pa dang / bag yod pa
184a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems rjes su mi gtong ba dang /
184a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag kyang byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid mthong ngam thos na sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la mos
184a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma gtogs par lha dang / mi dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi che ba nyid la mngon par dga' ba ma yin pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
184a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na khyod rtag par bag yod par bya ba dang / dad pa dang / dang ba mang ba dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos
184a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun dga' la dga' ba dang / mos par bya'o/ /khyod chos yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / chos 'dod par bya'i yul la chags par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po
184a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ 'dod pa rnams la chog pa med pa'i phyir te/ gang dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ngoms pa de dag ni ngoms pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ mi rnams kyi srog ni thung ba/
184b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i tshad kyang thung ba ste/ tshe rabs 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gang de bzhin gshegs pa la/
184b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dang / rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / chos mi zad pa dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang /
184b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mi zad pa ste bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyis lus yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa'i chogs kyis dag yongs su dag
184b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyis shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
184b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pas thabs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdud tshar gcod pas shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas smon lam
184b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang phrad pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po yul 'khor srung la
184b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam des yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/
185a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rin thang med pa'i mu tig gi do shal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so/ /yongs su longs
185a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad par bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de la phul lo/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so/ /btsun
185a3(dkon brtsegs): mo'i 'khor de thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos
185a4(dkon brtsegs): so| |rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi gtam thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ gos
185a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyan ci thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol par gyur te/ mngon par gsol nas kyang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i
185a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams mnos so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar rgyal po yul 'khor srung chos kyi rnyed pa phun sum tshogs pas rnyed pa chen po dang ldan nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen
185a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
185b1(dkon brtsegs): te| steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' las khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid nas rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can du slar 'khor nas/ rang gi khyim du phyin to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas
185b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po yul 'khor srung dus gzhan zhig na zla ba nya ba'i tshe me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal gyi sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir song nas/ de skyed mos tshal chen po de na gnas
185b3(dkon brtsegs): shing | sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu len pa dang / rtse ba'i dam pa rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /chung ma dam par ma smad pa zhes bya ba dang /
185b4(dkon brtsegs): dpe med ma zhes bya ba de gnyis rdzing dga' ba zhes bya bar khrus byas te/ spos chus gos brlan nas seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug go /de gnyis der 'dug pa'i
185b5(dkon brtsegs): pang pa nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gnyis skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te byung ngo / /khye'u de
185b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis byung ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni chos sems pa'o/ /kye ma khye'u 'di ni chos kyi blo gros so zhes sgra byung ngo / /zhi
185b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ de ltar 'jig rten du khye'u de gnyis chos sems pa dang / chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/ /de la khye'u chos sems pa ni/ btsun mo ma smad pa'i pang pa nas
186a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo / /chos kyi blo gros ni/ btsun mo dpe med pa'i pang pa nas byung ngo / /khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu skyil mo krung ma nyams par gnyi gas
186a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang dag byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing / /'jig rten mgon po yul du byung ba la/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal ba/ /de dag rnyed
186a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rab rnyed grogs po dag / gang zhig byang chub sems ni ma brjed pa/ /de ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i gting nas phyin/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ni yid kyang log /sems can rgya
186a4(dkon brtsegs): chen rnams kyis legs par gsungs/ /steng gi phyogs na yan lag ma smad pa/ /'dren pa mtshan ni dus dpog rgyal po ste/ /de nas bdag cag chos don gnyer ba dang / /'jig
186a5(dkon brtsegs): mgon yon tan 'byung gnas blta phyir mchis/ /khye'u de gnyis skyil mo krung bshig nas/ /de yi tshe na ma yi pang nas babs/ /yul 'khor srung po ga lar de gnyis dong / /rkang
186a6(dkon brtsegs): par phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar te 'dug / yab gcig bdag cag mchi ba gsan du gsol/ /bskal pa bye bar chos rnyed rab tu dka'/ /de rnyed nas ni byang chub ma thob bar/ /
186a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag ni gzhar yang mi gtong ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rtag tu rab rnyed dka'/ /pha ma dag ni chos la gnas pa dang / /dal ba 'byor dang chos 'dod grogs po
186b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | |mthun par gnas dang bstan la dad rab dkon/ /'dun dang brtson 'grus de bzhin bag yod dang / /rab tu byung thob rtag tu shes bzhin can/ /phan pa'i dngos dang mnyen dang ma
186b2(dkon brtsegs): khengs dang / /ngo tsha khrel yod thos dang tshul khrims bzang / /zhi dul spog chags rnams la snying rje byams/ /zab mo'i chos la chos kyi bzod ldan dang / /brtson 'grus mthu dang sems ni ma
186b3(dkon brtsegs): zhum dang / /bsdu bas sems can yongs su smin byed dang / /sems las rung zhing dpen par gnas pa dang / /lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta dang / /mgo dang gos la 'bar ltar chos sems
186b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de dag sangs rgyas yon tan de 'dra thob/ /bdag cag chos mchog gang dag rab brjid pa/ /chos mchog de dag yab gcig rab rnyed dka'/ /chos rnams de dag don du bdag cag lhags/
186b5(dkon brtsegs): da ni rgyal po'i drung du bzhud par bgyid/ /dkar po'i chos rnams kyis ni yongs zin cing / /skad cig gis ni mngon shes lnga thob pa/ /rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing ye shes can/ /byang chub
186b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mkhas pa de gnyis dong / /rgyal po bu dang bcas shing bud med bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon shes thob mkhas gnyis/ /ston pa yon tan rgyal mchog ga la bar//
186b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la ni der yang mngon du dong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /thams cad 'dus nas gus dang bcas par gnas/ /de nas rgyal sras chos kyi blo gros
187a1(dkon brtsegs): smras/ /byang chub lam de bdag cag bshad du gsol/ /rgyal pas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas/ /zab mo'i chos kyi gtam ni rab gsungs pa/ /
187a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams 'di dag rten nas byung ba ste/ /bdag po med cing byed pa po dang bral/ /nang yang stong zhing phyi rol rgyu ba med/ /chos rnams 'di dag srog dang gsob yin te/ /lha dang bya ba dag
187a3(dkon brtsegs): cing g.yo ba med/ /nam mkha' lta bur rtag tu gzung du med/ /bde bar gshegs pas chos gtam rnam dag pa/ /rnam pa mang po de dag rnams la bshad/ /bye ba phrag gsum khrag
187a4(dkon brtsegs): khrig bdun cu drug / mi skye bzod pa rjes su thob par gyur/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal bu yul 'khor srung gis zhag bdun gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas/
187a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rang gi khyim du slar phyin to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gcig
187a6(dkon brtsegs): pu dpen par song ste/ bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug nas nang du yang dag bzhag cing 'di snyam du sems te/ /bdag
187a7(dkon brtsegs): gi gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ni/ gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad kyi nang na gang thog mar bla na
187b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis brtag go snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis de'i mod la rin
187b2(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi bum pa byed du bcug ste/ byi dor legs par byas shing legs par zin par bya ba nas gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyi ming bris te/ bum pa de'i nang na bcug nas
187b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa byas nas/ pad+ma de'i steng du bum pa de bzhag ste/ zhag bdun du lha'i mchod pa me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / phye
187b4(dkon brtsegs): ma thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / rol mo'i sil snyan thams cad kyis mchod do/ /ming de dag mchod pa'i tshe na lha'i bu khri mchod pa'i las kyi
187b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson par gyur to/ /zhag bdun du mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang / de'i bu stong dang / gzhon nu de gnyis kyi mdun du ril gyis gser las byas pa'i khri'u bzang po'i
187b6(dkon brtsegs): steng du bum pa de bzhag nas/ nang gi mis bum pa de'i nang nas ming de rnams phyung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog mar rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya
187b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i ming byung bar gyur to/ /ming de byung ma thag tu smad cig de nyid las chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi pang na sil snyan yod pa de dag kyang ma
188a1(dkon brtsegs): dkrol bye ba phrag du ma'i sgra byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na thams cad kyi thog mar ming byung ba
188a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus
188a3(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
188a4(dkon brtsegs): gser thub de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ bcom
188a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'od srung de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba de'i ming byung
188a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |de ni nga yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu ska rags can zhes bya ba'i ming byung
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ de ni byams pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni seng ge zhes
188b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu glog gi lha zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og
188b2(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bzang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me tog dam pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu 'od kyi dpal
188b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni
188b4(dkon brtsegs): skar ma rgyal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni spyan legs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
188b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og rgyal bu gzhon nu rdul med ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni lag bzang zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu blo
188b6(dkon brtsegs): gros rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dge ba bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/
188b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu phyogs 'phyor pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni mngon 'phags gshegs
189a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ /de ni
189a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni nor dpal zhes bya ba'i de
189a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu lus shin tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
189a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og
189a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen grags pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rgya cher bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/
189a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bu stong yod pa de'i nang nas gcig bzhag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu cod pan brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi bar du byung ngo / /de ni yon tan mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya
189a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur pa dang / snag gi
189b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mtshams thams cad dang / spun rnams na re/ gang gi tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byas pa
189b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci zhig byar yod ces spyos pa dang / blo gros mtha' yas kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra/ /bdag gi yid la sems can zad
189b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med snyam bgyid/ /tshul khrims kyis ni bdag gi smon lam 'di dag gyur/ /bdag gi smon lam ci 'dra thams cad 'dir gson cig /khyed kyi tshe tshad ji tsam pa dag bsdoms pa dang / /
189b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi rgyal po ji snyed de dag kun bsdoms pa/ /thams cad bsdoms pa de snyed bdag gi tsher gyur te/ /bdag gi dge slong tshogs kyang de kun ma lus snyed/ /de yis tshigs su bcad pa
189b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni smras ma thag / de yi tshe na legs zhes lha yis sgra phyung ste/ /sems can dag pa khyod kyi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /khyod kyis ji ltar bsam bzhin sems can don mdzod cig /
189b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung du gyur pa blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma pa mos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur
189b7(dkon brtsegs): te| zhi ba'i blo gros/ bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi che'i tshad ji tsam pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa
190a1(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de srid du 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur ro/ /bdag de ltar mos pa na de'i phyir mos pa zhes bya'o/ /
190a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong du gcig gis mtshang ba dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji snyed mdzad pa de snyed de bzhin gshegs pa mos pas byed par 'gyur bas/
190a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa'i tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas gzhon nu stong po de dag gis
190a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu chos sems pa dang / chos kyi blo gros de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab/ chos
190a5(dkon brtsegs): sems pas smras pa/ grogs po dag /bdag ni khyed thams cad kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te/ nang na spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad las phyi rol du ma gyur
190a6(dkon brtsegs): la| phyi nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa de ltar bdag smon lam 'debs so/ /chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ snag gi gnyen mtshams
190a7(dkon brtsegs): dag| bgres rabs dag / bdag ni khyed rnams thams cad kyis byang chub thob pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul te/ bdag gis bskul bas khyed thams cad kyis
190b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'di ltar 'debs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de gnyis kyang smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das des lung bstan
190b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur pa de khyod kyis gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir
190b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i bu gzhon nu stong yod pa de dag ni bskal pa bzang
190b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa zhes bya ba'i bar dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon
190b5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ btsun mo ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba'i khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di
190b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ btsun mo dpe med ma zhes bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba'i khye'u chos kyi blo gros zhes bya
190b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni tshangs pa gtsug phud can 'di yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gyur pa
191a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams kyis sems can gang dag bla na med pa
191a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la mthar gyis lung
191a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bsam pa thams cad 'byor pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa chud mi za
191a4(dkon brtsegs): brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi 'gal ba la ltos/ yul 'khor srung gi sngon gyi tshul gyi le'u ste lnga ba'o// //zhi ba'i blo gros/ de lta bas na byang chub sems
191a5(dkon brtsegs): d pa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can chen po de dag gi rjes su bslab
191a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i/ byang chub kyi lam la mngon par brtson pas bsgrub pa snying por bya'o/ /de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'i rjes su
191a7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / tshangs
191b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas bzhi bsgrub pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba yongs su skong pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas
191b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs gsog pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam ni/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang /
191b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / drang ba nyid dang / g.yo med pa nyid dang / yangs pa nyid dang / sgrib pa med pa nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / sems snyoms
191b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid yin no/ /lam de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'byor pa'o/ /lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
191b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gro'o/ /lam de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gnod pa med pa'o/ /lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyun chad med pa'o/ /lam de ni bsam gtan gyi pha
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pas mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par rtogs pa'o/ /lam de ni byams pa chen pos 'byung ba shes pa'i rjes su song pa'o/ /
191b7(dkon brtsegs): lam de ni snying rje chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'o/ /lam de ni dga' ba chen pos mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o/ /lam de ni btang snyoms chen pos snying po'i rjes su song ba'o/ /lam de
192a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas sdong dum dang / tsher ma med pa'o/ /lam de ni zhe 'gras
192a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems med pas bde bar 'gro ba'o/ /lam de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang bral bas g.yo can dang bral ba'o/ /lam de ni phung po dang / khams dang /
192a3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la legs par btags pas phyir rgol ba dang bral ba'o/ /lam de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o/ /lam de ni nyan thos dang /
192a4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang bral bas sems rlabs po cher 'gro ba'o/ /lam de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
192a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis zhugs pa'o/ /lam de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che dang mthun pa'i rin po che chen po bsgrub pa'o/ /lam de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas
192a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gsal ba'o/ /lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par yongs su zin pas dge ba ston pa'o/ /lam de ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas mthon
192a7(dkon brtsegs): dman med pa'o/ /lam de ni gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba med pas rdul dang bral ba'o/ /lam de ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror 'gro ba'o/ /lam
192b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas bde ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na gang la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba med pa dang /
192b2(dkon brtsegs): lam ma yin pa de 'dra ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ lam de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
192b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya'o/ /byang chub kyi lam gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras
192b4(dkon brtsegs): so| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ci 'dra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyogs tsam zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig /de skad ces smras pa
192b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
192b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyi/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gsum po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku'i gsang ba dang / gsung gi
192b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba dang / thugs kyi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi dgongs
193a1(dkon brtsegs): shing rab tu mi rtog par spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ de la lha dang mi kha cig 'dug pa gtso bor byed pa de dag
193a2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig 'chag pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi
193a3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'greng ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'greng bar mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig nyal ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa
193a4(dkon brtsegs): mnal bar mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig chos ston pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig mi smra ba gtso bor
193a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi gsung bar gyur par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig bsam gtan gtso bor byed pa de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam
193a6(dkon brtsegs): gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig langs pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhengs par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig mig
193a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzum par blta ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig 'dzum pa byed pa gtso bor 'dzin pa
193b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad par mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku
193b2(dkon brtsegs): mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mthong ngo / /de bzhin du la las ni dngul gyi mdog tu mthong ngo / /de bzhin du shel gyi mdog dang / bai DUR+Ya'i mdog dang / rdo'i snying po'i mdog dang / spug
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gi mdog dang / mu tig dmar po'i mdog dang / mu tig dkar po'i mdog dang / mdog dmar po dang / mdog dkar po dang / btsod ka'i mdog dang / mdog sngon po dang / mdog
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / zla ba'i mdog dang / nyi ma'i mdog dang / ma'i mdog dang / 'od kyi mdog dang / brgya byin gyi mdog dang / tshangs pa'i mdog dang / ba mo'i mdog dang / ldong ros kyi
193b5(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong ngo / /la las ni chu'i mdog dang / la las ni mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / sna ma'i me tog gi
193b6(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / bar shi ka'i mdog dang / pad+ma'i mdog dang / ku mu ta'i mdog dang / pad+ma dkar po'i mdog dang / dpal gyi mdog dang / rnam thos kyi bu'i mdog dang / ngang
193b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal bo ngang skya'i mdog dang / /pad+ma sar pa'i mdog dang / dpal gyi snying po'i mdog dang / rin po che byi ru'i mdog dang / nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang / an da rnyil
194a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdog dang / nam mkha' dag pa gzi brjid kyi mdog dang / lha dang mi kha cig yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par mos bde dag gis ni de
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi sngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan par mthong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar yongs su brtag par nye bar bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi
194a3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / gang yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mi'i
194a4(dkon brtsegs): lus thob par gyur la/ de'i nang nas sems can gcig gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa snyed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags
194a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | dbyibs dang / spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par bsgrub la/ sems can gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re res kyang de snyed
194a6(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam du sems shing mos te/ mngon par bsgrub la/ sems can gcig
194a7(dkon brtsegs): gis sems kyi mos pa gang yin pa de sems can gnyis pa'i ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems
194b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad de/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam du shes
194b2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/ thugs kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis lhun gyis grub pas/ sems
194b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par mdzad pa'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam gyis kun du bzhugs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta
194b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la gzugs su snang ba la ci 'dra ba nye bar bzhag pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de na lhag chad med par mtshungs par
194b5(dkon brtsegs): snang yang / me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi rtog go /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi dgongs mi rtog par lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams
194b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
194b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ las las byung ba ma yin/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/ pha ma
195a1(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur bo las byung ba ma yin/ sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa ma yin/ rus pa dang chu ba'i bog des
195a2(dkon brtsegs): sbrel ba ma yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/ chos kyi sku dang / gzugs dang /
195a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan med pa'i sku dang / spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i sku yin yang de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig la snang
195a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs las dben pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang par mi 'gyur ro
195a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i sems can gyi nang nas kyang kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong / kha cig gis ni mi mthong / kha cig ni rgyang
195a6(dkon brtsegs): ring po na 'dug kyang mthong / kha cig ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong / kha cig ni thag ring po na 'dug kyang mthong / kha cig ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong ngo / la las ni dran
195a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pas mthong la g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo / /la las ni g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mthong la/ dran pa'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo / /la las ni gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pas
195b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing bdag gis bltas bas mi mthong ngo / /la las ni bdag gis bltas pas mthong la/ gzhan gyis bstan pas mi mthong ngo / /la las ni rmi lam mthong la/ sad pa na mi
195b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / /la las ni sad pa na mthong la rmi lam na mi mthong ngo / /la las ni mnyam par bzhag na mthong la langs na mi mthong ngo / /la las ni langs na mthong la mnyam par
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag na mi mthong ngo / /la las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no/ /la las ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par mi mthong la/ sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin
195b4(dkon brtsegs): no| |la las ni ma btsal bas mi mthong la/ btsal bas mthong ngo / /la las ni ma bcal bas mthong la/ btsal bas mi mthong ngo / /la las ni bsgrims na mthong la/ ma bsgrims
195b5(dkon brtsegs): na ma yin no/ /la las ni ma bsgrims na mthong la/ bsgrims na ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam
195b6(dkon brtsegs): par ston par mdzad do/ /gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu'i lus dang spyod pa dang spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ mnyam par bzhag pa/ lus zhi ba dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul
195b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag par bya ba'am mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog
196a1(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pas tshad med pa'o/ chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de
196a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab bo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin
196a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni spros pa med pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin
196a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku yang spros pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin
196a5(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /zhi
196a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs
196a7(dkon brtsegs): su snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can du snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di
196b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i nang du ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'dus so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du yang sems can du snang ba thams cad
196b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de
196b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag
196b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin no/ /zhi
196b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196b6(dkon brtsegs): spyi gtsug mthong par nus pa de ni kho pos lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang
196b7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ kho bos 'di ltar mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
197a1(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lon te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na/ shar phyogs
197a2(dkon brtsegs): logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan
197a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
197a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems
197a5(dkon brtsegs): te| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong la/ sku tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su
197a6(dkon brtsegs): btsal bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
197a7(dkon brtsegs): sku la bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul
197b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyi/ bdag gis de bas kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis
197b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bskyed pas steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung byed ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs
197b3(dkon brtsegs): pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la bzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas de 'jig rten gyi khams
197b4(dkon brtsegs): der gnas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dam mtha' yang ma dmigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
197b5(dkon brtsegs): shugs 'chang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i
197b6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
197b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag thag rje srid cig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ khyod 'jig
198a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag thag ring po zhig nas
198a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la/ sku'i tshad dam mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so/ /
198a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ga te shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par steng gi
198a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs logs su song du zin kyang / bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang dpe bzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
198a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi dper bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / gzugs
198a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshan gyi dper bya ba'i dper 'god pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o/ /dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ltar dper nam mkha'o/ /
198a7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo/ /shes rab kyang de tsam mo/ /rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo/ /rnam
198b1(dkon brtsegs): par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang de tsam mo/ /sku yang de tsam mo/ /gsung yang de tsam mo/ /thugs kyang de tsam mo/ /gzugs kyang de tsam mo/ /mtshan yang de tsam mo/ /de bas na nam mkha'
198b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad med pa khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de
198b3(dkon brtsegs): las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
198b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa
198b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
198b6(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi/ /sangs
198b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos la mi gang zhig / pha rol du ni mchi 'tshal ba/ /de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags/ /sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du/ /gang+gA bye ba phrag brgya yi/ /bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi/ /zhing rnams
199a1(dkon brtsegs): su ni bdag mchis so/ /de snyed zhing du mchis nas ni/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing du mchis/ /'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang / /sku yi tshad kyang ma mthong
199a2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /zhing de na ni 'dre na bzhugs pa/ /mtshan ni dpal gyi snying po lags/ /de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /'di skad du ni bka' stsal to/ /la las sangs rgyas chos
199a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ /dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tshal te/ /de dag rgyal la skur ba 'debs/ /'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste/ /nam mkha'i khams su bstan
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos dang mthun/ /gang na'ang de yi tshad ma mchis/ /nam mkha' 'di ni ji tsam par/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni tshul khrims dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang rnam
199a5(dkon brtsegs): grol dang / /rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam/ /nam mkha'i tshad ni ji tsam pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyang de tsam ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i dbu'i gtsug kyang / /nam mkha'i
199a6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang mtshungs pa lags/ /nam mkhas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /skus kyang de snyed khyab pa lags/ /sku yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /'od
199a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /gsung gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /thugs kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /byams
199b1(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab/ /ye shes ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa/ /
199b2(dkon brtsegs): de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid/ /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang / /de la gal te gzugs mchis na/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ /de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/ /
199b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba/ /de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /byang chub sems las rab tu byung / /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po
199b4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed brjod pa bas/ /dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na/ /de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo / /dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du/ /bskal pa bye
199b5(dkon brtsegs): bar brjod byas kyang / /mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de/ /stong pa nyid la mos pa yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi ri lags/ /
199b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas/ /byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang / /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa/ /'di ni bsod nams sdud pa lags/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen
199b7(dkon brtsegs): po| |chos kyi rtogs pa 'di thos nas/ /de yi byang chub spyad spyod cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan 'thob par 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na/ /zhing rnams bye bar rab tu g.yos/ /lha
200a1(dkon brtsegs): ni bye ba phrag stong gis/ /rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba blangs/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phye ba nyid/ /shugs 'chang gis ni 'di bshad thos/ /srog chags bye ba phrag
200a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dag / byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po/ /rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas/ /gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /dpag yas bla na ma
200a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis lags/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// //bam po bzhi pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de na sems can du ma 'khor gcig
200a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dus pa dag las/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo / /de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas blta'o/ /gang
200a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
200a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la byang chub kyi rim gro pa'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du 'brang zhing /
200a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du bzed na sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pas
200b1(dkon brtsegs): kham tshad du blangs pa de de yang snod de nyid na 'dug ste/ de lha de dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang
200b2(dkon brtsegs): gis skye gnas de dang de dag tu 'phangs pa/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas mi rnyed pa/ bkres pas nyams chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos
200b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi pham phabs de byin nas sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang / bkres skom dang bral te/ bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
200b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /gang dag log par ltung ba yi dwags sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de nyid
200b5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa chos
200b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal zas can du de ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa/ sra ba snying po can/ mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /zhi ba'i
200b7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang / long ka med de/ rnag gam/ khrag gam/ 'chil ma'am/ ngar snabs sam/ ngan skyugs sam/ mi gtsang ba med kyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros/
201a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste/ khog stong ma yin/ ba spu'i bu ga med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo
201a2(dkon brtsegs): gros/ 'di ltar ci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra yang 'jam khyad ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang gi tshe gzi
201a3(dkon brtsegs): brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba na/ sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par
201a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag nyon mongs pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang / tshod de yod do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag
201a5(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong
201a6(dkon brtsegs): na de dag byams pa thob bo/ /gti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag ye shes kyi snang ba thob bo/ /cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag nyon mongs pa dang
201a7(dkon brtsegs): bral bar shes so/ /ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro//
201b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na de dag bzod pa 'thob bo/ /le lo can gang dag gis mthong na de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems g.yeng ba gang dag gis mthong na
201b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdor na sems can dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag
201b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun chad nas / dge ba'i sems
201b4(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ /
201b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs
201b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to/ /sprul lo/ /sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ /
201b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang
202a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma pa/ kha
202a2(dkon brtsegs): dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong pa dag byung ste/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba byed pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang /
202a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dang sku'i phrin las te/ sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug
202a4(dkon brtsegs): pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi/ bskal pa'am de bas lhag par brjod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin
202a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
202a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po
202a7(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje la lha dang / mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo
202b1(dkon brtsegs): rje'i spyi bo la bzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
202b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang snang zhing rjes su dgyes so/ /zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
202b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las
202b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo
202b5(dkon brtsegs): len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so/ /gsung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i
202b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs phyung ba'am/ rngub pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par mi dpyod do/ /rnam par
202b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med na ngag mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mi rtog /rnam par mi dpyod/ rtog par mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par mi mdzad/ mi gsung / mi
203a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod/ gsung bar mi mdzad kyang sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu
203a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig pa mi mdzad kyang sems can yi ge lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs
203a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ bdag cag la chos ston to/ /bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo/ /de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su
203a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang / sgros dang / zhal gyi rkan dang / ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la/ 'byung bar yang grag go/ de bzhin
203a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha' las 'byung na/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /zhi
203a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jam pa dang /
203a7(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / snyan pa dang dul ba dang /
203b1(dkon brtsegs): mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / rnar snyan pa dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' bde bskyed pa dang /
203b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / kun tu shes par bya ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / kun shes par byed
203b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / rigs pa dang 'brel ba dang / zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang / glang po che'i sgra skad dang / 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang
203b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i sgra dang / dri za'i glu dbyangs dang / bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang / shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang / lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar
203b5(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa dang / rnga'i sgra dang / ma khengs pa dang / mi dma' ba dang / sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / tshig zur chag pa med pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / mi zhan pa dang /
203b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang / khyab pa dang / chub pa dang / rgyun chags pa dang / 'brel ba dang / sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ma smad pa dang / mi 'gyur
203b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma brtags pa dang / 'khor kun du grag pa dang / 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang 'dul ba dang / gti mug sel ba dang / bdud tshar gcod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
204a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros /
204a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang /
204a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde'am/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde'am/ lung du bstan pa'i sde'am/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde'am/ ched du brjod pa'i sde'am/
204a4(dkon brtsegs): gleng gzhi'i sde'am/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde'am/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde'am/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'am/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde'am/ gtan la phabs par bstan pa'i sde'am/ dpe'am/
204a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul lam/ rtogs pa rjod pa'i sde'am/ kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe'am/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe'am/ rab tu 'jog go zhe'am/ rnam
204a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'byed do zhe'am/ rnam par 'grel to zhe'am/ brjod do zhe'am/ yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so/ /de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa
204a7(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram/ dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
204b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang rung ste/ der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang / de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgongs par 'gyur ba de 'dra
204b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang / chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod pa med par thams cad kyang
204b3(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems
204b4(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsungs na/ sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni/ sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 'di
204b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med de/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de bskal pa tsam du bshad
204b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod
204b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang de dag re re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshe tshad bskal pa brgya stong du
205a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pas sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug
205a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do/ /sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de yang de bzhin gshegs
205a3(dkon brtsegs): pas tshad dang ldan par ston to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung
205a4(dkon brtsegs): ste| zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su
205a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba mi shes kyi nam mkha' las 'byung bar shes so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
205a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so/ /snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
205a7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang / spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang / dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang / phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang / dpral ba dang /
205b1(dkon brtsegs): smin mtshams dang / mdzod spu dang / spyan dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / 'gram pa dang / zhal dang / mgul nas byung bar shes pa dang / de bzhin du dpung pa dang / phyag dang / sor mo
205b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | rtsib logs dang / brang dang / rgyab dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i gnas dang / brla dang / pus mo'i lha nga dang / byin pa dang / long bu dang / zhabs kyi mthil dang / mtshan rnams dang /
205b3(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod do/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin
205b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ mos pa ji lta ba dang / yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
205b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar shes kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo sil snyan
205b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par sbyar ba byas pa/ gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de/ 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba
205b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med mod kyi/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa yang 'byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i
206a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pas bskyod na 'byung ste/ 'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byin par spro ba yang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par
206a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig
206a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yang 'byung la/ de'i nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa las kyang mi dmigs so/ /zhi pa'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang
206a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed par 'byung la de'i nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin la/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/
