206a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gis
206a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ zhi pa'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag
206a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa yang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gis bsam pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
206b1(dkon brtsegs): gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang
206b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam/ mtha' gzung
206b3(dkon brtsegs): bar nus pa de ni/ kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
206b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la byang chub
206b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa la brten nas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos
206b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de 'jug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil
206b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro ba zhig bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rang gi
207a1(dkon brtsegs): stan gyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas de de na 'dug na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra bar kho nar thos so/ /rang gi rdzu
207a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi nub phyogs kyi ri rab las 'das shing gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das/ khor yug las kyang 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug na yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra bar kho nar thos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du
207a4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te/ kye ma mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyi/ ngas 'di dag la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyi bstongs pa
207a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das
207a6(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang ston
207a7(dkon brtsegs): pa der gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/ de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dom gang tsam
207b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mis mi cig shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
207b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung sgra thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad
207b3(dkon brtsegs): phyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems
207b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma'i gdu bu la
207b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chag cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma bskyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
207b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog
207b7(dkon brtsegs): go| de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'
208a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag khyad du gsod kyi/ khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin
208a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rlabs kyis/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig /de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba
208a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rin po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bya'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis
208a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig / de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bus steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che'i gling de
208a5(dkon brtsegs): skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so/ /skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'phyang ngo / /mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi 'bru thams cad las
208a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo / /'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang pad+ma rnams byung ngo / /pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba
208a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
208b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te bsngags pa gsung ngo / /de nas gnas brtan mo'u dga' gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
208b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar stong dang / stong gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong
208b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus na bab par shes
208b4(dkon brtsegs): na gyis shig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar
208b5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis /
208b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs
208b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad
209a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes bar 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyi khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma bskyed cig/ gal te
209a2(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
209a3(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no/ /de nas gnas brtan
209a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i
209a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtog par 'tshal bas/ bdag ni nongs pa can de nongs pa 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka'
209a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
209a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas/ lus dub ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi ba'i rdo mi thog go/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam
209b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin
209b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyi/ khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang / de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ gal te khyod
209b3(dkon brtsegs): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur
209b4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar ram/ lho'am/ nub bam/ byang ngam/ phyogs gang zhig tu phyin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag phyogs slad de/ gang nas 'dir
209b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
209b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni/ bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/ bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
209b7(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so/ /de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la
210a1(dkon brtsegs): gtugs te/ shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa/ /ye shes mtha' yas
210a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas gsung ldan pa/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su gsol/ /slar yang zhing 'dir rab tu mchi bar bgyi/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das
210a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyis bus gsol ba btab ba'i sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
210a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di
210a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mo'u dgal gyi bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer
210a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pas/ gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta
210a7(dkon brtsegs): bu phyung ngo / /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mo'u dgal
210b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang / 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
210b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po blta
210b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer des sangs
210b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
210b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu
210b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/
210b7(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dga' gyi bu/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brangs te shog cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te
211a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi
211a2(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de
211a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal na/ de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags
211a4(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ji tsam pa de tsam lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal
211a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/ mo'u dgal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam /
211a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de
211a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo/ /gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag
211b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad
211b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sems can gcig gi sems dang sems
211b3(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/
211b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsi ba'am/ brtag par mi nus na/ sems can thams cad kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du
211b5(dkon brtsegs): chud par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
211b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong gsum
211b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang yin pa/ /de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas/ /bskal par sems can gcig cig gi /sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so/ /sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa/ /sangs
212a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang / /nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes/ /de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems pa dag ni ji
212a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa/ /'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do/ /chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa/ /chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi/ /chos ston
212a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang de tsam mo/ /sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni/ /ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa/ /sems can gcig po'i spu gcig nas/ /'od zer 'byung ba de snyed do/ /'jig rten mgon po'i
212a4(dkon brtsegs): spu kun gyi/ /'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa/ /mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe/ /gsung gi yan lag de bas mang / /dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /bskal pa rab tu bstan mdzad kyang / /sangs
212a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis ni gsung dbyangs kyi/ /mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams/ /gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod/ /gzugs can min pa'i tshig
212a6(dkon brtsegs): gis ni/ /nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed/ /ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa/ /thams cad du ni mi dmigs te/ /de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa/ /shin tu dmigs par mi
212a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar tshig ni yod min te/ /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/ /de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing / /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/ /ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung / /gang
212b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs shing / /de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin/ /sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ /rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa/ /de dag lus dang sems
212b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas/ /gnas pa med pa'ang ma yin no/ /ji ltar sil snyan 'phrul 'khor byas/ /rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba/ /sgra 'byin byed pa gang yang med/ /'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung / /de
212b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pas bskyod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang / /'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'/ /ji ltar brag ca rnams kyi sgra/ /nang dang phyi rol mi
212b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ /de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung / /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/ /ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par/ /snang bas sems can tshim par byed/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtog gsung / /sgra kun

215b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/ brda yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams

216b2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// //bam po
216b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ phyogs
216b4(dkon brtsegs): b cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams
216b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur
216b6(dkon brtsegs): la/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu lta bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi
216b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing / rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu
217a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal ba'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tshom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal
217a2(dkon brtsegs): te| yongs su bsal na sems can gcig gi the tshom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa'i ma yin zhing / zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyi the tshom kyi dri
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang / de sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran
217a4(dkon brtsegs): pas thams cad bzung nas gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de/ de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tshom gyi dri ba chad par shes shing /
217a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad
217a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dogs pa gcod cing sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa'am/ gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la/ mdzad
217a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o/ /'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin
217b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
217b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod
217b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang btang ngo / /de nas
217b4(dkon brtsegs): me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yang phog/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la yang phog cing / 'khor thams cad la yang 'thor ro/ /rin po che'i gdugs de
217b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go/ rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das
217b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa bzang po'i
217b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
218a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
218a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag
218a3(dkon brtsegs): ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro
218a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/
218a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de
218a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to/ /bsnyad do/ /yang dag par bshad do/ /gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems
218a7(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni ring po mi thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mi dngang / mi
218b1(dkon brtsegs): skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
218b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/
218b3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /me tog gi char chen po yang bab bo/ /sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra byang byung ngo / /sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /
218b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
218b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so/ /de nas 'khor de'i khyams
218b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo / /de dag steng
218b7(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to//
219a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag
219a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med
219a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag
219a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig pa dang / lta bar 'gyur ba'i sgo glegs bcag nas chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang / shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur
219a5(dkon brtsegs): ro| |de skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par 'gyur te/ 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du
219a6(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo
219a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang /
219b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i
219b2(dkon brtsegs): d migs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su ma 'brang
219b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste/ gang
219b4(dkon brtsegs): gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma
219b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi mnga'o/ /thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/
219b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs la rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs la tshad mi mnga'/ thugs la 'khrul ba mi mnga'/ thugs la sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yeng ba mi
219b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ thugs la khengs pa mi mnga'/ thugs la dma' ba mi mnga'/ thugs la kun du srung ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la shin tu rings pa mi mnga'/ thugs
220a1(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs la nges par sems pa mi mnga'/ thugs la
220a2(dkon brtsegs): dgyes pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par rtog pa mi
220a3(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mi mnga'/ rang gi
220a4(dkon brtsegs): thugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la blta ba mi mnga'/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa
220a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs dmigs pa la
220a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs na ngan nas pa mi mnga'/ thugs phyi rol na gnas pa mi mnga'o/ /thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go /
220a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go /thugs de 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs
220b1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ste/ thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags/ ma thogs par 'jug go /rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can
220b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go /gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do/ /gzigs pas gzigs pa dang /
220b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig
220b4(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna bas thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi
220b5(dkon brtsegs): sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin la/ de
220b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi
220b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la/ mngon par 'du mdzad par mi mnga' bar gnas so/ /sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la gzigs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
221a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga'
221a2(dkon brtsegs): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid
221a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la/ de'i chos thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i
221a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyang gang du yang mi chags so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi
221a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
221a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas mnyam mo/ /sprul pa'i chos nyid
221a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnam par mi rtog go / de la sku'i rtsom pa dang / gsung gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/ de yang lhun gyis grub
221b1(dkon brtsegs): cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams
221b2(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
221b3(dkon brtsegs): shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams la gnas pa ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa
221b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ phyi la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha
221b5(dkon brtsegs): na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pas ma yin/ 'das pa la
221b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtag pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/
221b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga'o/ /de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi
222a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing / thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de yang lhun gyis
222a2(dkon brtsegs): grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i
222a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i
222a4(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu dag na bskal
222a5(dkon brtsegs): p a bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi
222a6(dkon brtsegs): slad na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyi zhog cig/ lha dang bcas pa'i
222a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu/ gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de
222b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
222b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags
222b3(dkon brtsegs): te| 'di sngon ni bdag gis nam yang ma mthong ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ga na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
222b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyab rgyab na yang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag na rdo rjes gzugs su kun tu ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong
222b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan
222b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol
222b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te/ sngon ni ma mthong ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu ku gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang chub
223a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ma/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
223a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje/ rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
223a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste/ byin gyis brlabs pa de dag thams
223a4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na yang 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo
223a5(dkon brtsegs): rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu/ gsang pa ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo
223a6(dkon brtsegs): rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di
223a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ /gsang pa pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
223b1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa bstan pa las brtsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba dang / gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/
223b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/ de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste/ bstan par sla ba ma yin mod
223b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi| 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa na rnam pa gcig ma yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems
223b4(dkon brtsegs): dpas spyad do/ /dka' thub dang / lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang / lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags
223b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub gang dag gis bya bas kun du bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun du
223b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcig btsugs te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong / kha
223b7(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni nyi ma lta zhing 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong / kha cig gis ni tso tsog pur 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong / kha cig
224a1(dkon brtsegs): gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgrengs te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni kha phub tu 'dug par mthong / kha
224a2(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis
224a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rtsig pa la snyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la snyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la snyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs
224a4(dkon brtsegs): su bsgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'o gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa bal ba dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha'i gos
224a5(dkon brtsegs): gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dwags kyi pags pa'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa rtsir gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sgren mor 'dug pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa dar b+ha'i
224a6(dkon brtsegs): gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang / kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang / lo ma za ba
224a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / me tog za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang / sdong bu za ba dang / gzegs ma za ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang / zhag drug smyung ba dang / sha mi za ba dang / rgya shugs za ba dang / nas
224b1(dkon brtsegs): shin te ma za ba dang / ci tse za ba dang / mon sran sde'u za ba dang / mon sran dre'u za ba dang / bra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang / chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / mar gyi
224b2(dkon brtsegs): thigs ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar
224b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang /
224b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston ste/ lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to/ /brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par
224b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang / sems can gzhan dang gzhan
224b6(dkon brtsegs): la ma mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtugs zhugs dang / dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis sems can de
224b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba ni ma gtogs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
225a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag la kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyad pa 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su
225a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par byas so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing
225a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi g.yo ba dang / bde ba myong ba dang / lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo / /zhi
225a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi
225a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi tshul la 'jug
225a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar lo drug tshang
225a7(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub de dag las langs te/ klung ne rany+dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang mthun par khrus byas te/ lus
225b1(dkon brtsegs): gtsang mar byas nas/ klung ne rany+dza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to/ /de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te/ byang chub
225b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo / /gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu yang rang rang gi
225b3(dkon brtsegs): zas thogs te 'khod nas/ so so nas tshig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dam pa/ bdag gi bshos gsol cig /kye skyes bu dam pa/ bdag gi bshos gsol cig zer ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ des na
225b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za bye ba khrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi kha zas de dag blangs nas thams cad
225b5(dkon brtsegs): zos kyang phan tshun mi mthong ngo / /lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gis bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par
225b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'gyur bar shes so/ /de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
225b7(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpas zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o/ /zas len pas sems can yongs su
226a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus
226a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo / /der song ba dang / sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzang zhes bya bas sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la
226a3(dkon brtsegs): bos te smras pa/ sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi spyod pa/ /sred pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon/ /sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan
226a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /legs so zhes te sa la spyod rnams dga'/ /stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed/ /me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs/ /spos chu dag gis
226a5(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhi chag chag btab/ /lag na gzhong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs/ /gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin par snang la/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'/ /de tshe
226a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs rab tu phab/ /gling bzhi pa dag rnams na skyong ba'i gzhi/ /ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te/ /rnam par 'dren la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ /gser gyi dra bas stong
226a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum thams cad bkab/ /stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ /sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa/ /de ltas stong
226b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan/ /'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste/ /skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir/ /mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun/ /
226b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' bai DUR+Ya yi dra bas bkab/ /dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang / /de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas/ /rgyan phreng de bzhin zla gam rnams kyang thogs/ /mu ti gsil
226b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/ /lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar/ /rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/ /dril bu'i dra bas gser gyi dar bcas nas/ /sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum
226b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bkab/ /thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir/ /dbang bsgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che/ /rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa/ /'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig
226b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sprul/ /klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci kun gyis/ rang rang gnas nas bkod pa rnams kyis ni/ /'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas//
226b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang bsgyur zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas tshangs ris kyi lha
226b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bsnams pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba mnabs
227a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub
227a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su bzhugs
227a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi
227a4(dkon brtsegs): dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil
227a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol
227a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i thabs brnyes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams
227a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis gzungs ma bsnyel bar rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/
227b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub
227b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
227b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can
227b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang / sngon dam bcas
227b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying
227b6(dkon brtsegs): por bzhud kyi/ de la grogs po dag/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba spro bar gyis shig/ de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag
227b7(dkon brtsegs): po de yid rab tu dga' nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po dam pa
228a1(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzhud kyi/ de la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs
228a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa/ /lha
228a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi yi mchod pa lha yi lha/ /thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs/ /bde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'tshang rgya dang / /rdzogs
228a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bkang dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /mkhas pa seng+ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang / /sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /
228a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/ /phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang / /sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba
228a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/ /legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dug nas ni/ /sa yi gzhi ni legs par
228a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par bya/ /stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye/ /'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos/ /'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin/ /de ltar gzugs
228b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya/ /tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes/ /rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba/ /de bas lhag pa'i
228b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa de dag bstan/ /me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang / /rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags/ /tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha yi rnams/ /rab tu dga'
228b3(dkon brtsegs): nas stong gsum thams cad kyang / /dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas/ /rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas/ /lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang / /lhag pa lhag pa'i
228b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas/ /byang chub rdo rje gdan ni rgyan par byed/ /spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs/ /me tog sna tshogs dang kyang 'thor par
228b5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /sa gzhi dag las rin chen rnams kyang bkram/ /byang chub snying por brgyan rnams rab tu bstan/ /thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa/ /de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas
228b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs
228b7(dkon brtsegs): po dag/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di la byang chub kyi snying por
229a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhud kyi/ de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan pa gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi
229a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag po tshangs pas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa/ /phan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid che/ /de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du/ /shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud/ /thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong par bya/ /stong gsum mi mjed 'di dag
229a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par bya/ /'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang / /yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas gyur/ /tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas/ /stong gsum thams
229a5(dkon brtsegs): cad ma lus rgyan byed cing / /legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan/ /'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang / /bye ba'i gdugs
229a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams nam mkhar de dag sbrul/ /sA la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa/ /dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul/ /lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa/ /de ni
229a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rta bdun bstan tshad du sprul/ /rin chen gzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram/ /kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor/ /brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa/ /de dag lha mi rnams
229b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sngon ma mthong / /sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar/ /de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan/ /'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang / /gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og
229b2(dkon brtsegs): min lha yi rnams/ /stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni/ /byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni/ /'dod pa'i khams
229b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa/ /lha'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi/ /de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan/ /phyogs bzhi dag na lha mi bye ba lhags/ /me tog rnams dang spos dang
229b4(dkon brtsegs): byug pa yis/ /byang chub shing ni mngon du rgyan par byed/ /spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs/ /byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du
229b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ /lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa/ /bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nus/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na rkang pa'i
229b6(dkon brtsegs): mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'ong des sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can
229b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun bcad do/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub sems dpa'i
230a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'khor la tshigs su bcad
230a2(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od/ /gnas 'dir lhang der gyur pas na/ /kho bo'i lus 'di rab tu tshim/ /sems kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas
230a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ /ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni/ /gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ /legs par phye ma phreng ba dang / /me tog spos dang byug pa dang / /gser
230a4(dkon brtsegs): dang nor bu mu tig dang / /dud dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang / /rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /ba dan dag kyang bsgrengs byas te/ /ston
230a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni mchod par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di la/ /bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rab tu dga' ba yis/ /sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nag
230a6(dkon brtsegs): po chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
230a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par
230b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul nas spos chu'i char pa ni 'bebs/ klu'i me tog dang / me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing / klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin
230b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang / sil snyan len pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor
230b3(dkon brtsegs): ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /skyes bu mchog gi 'od 'di rab bkye bas/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir thams cad snang bar 'gyur//
230b4(dkon brtsegs): skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi/ /nag po'i gnas kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur/ /klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas/ /rab tu dga' ste de tshe tshig smras pa/ /gser gyi mdog gi
230b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis khyab par gyur/ /de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du gdon mi za/ /klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te/ /gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su/ /byang chub sems
230b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de ni ga lar song / /phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug /sa kun rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes par brgyan/ /shing mchog kun dang sman dang
230b7(dkon brtsegs): rtswa rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud/ /'di na yod pa'i chu klung thams cad mi 'babs mkha' la rlung mi ldang / /de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon
231a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla ba'i 'od mi snang / /mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song gsum po zhi/ /bdag gi
231a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par byed/ /de ring rgyal ba byon par 'gyur gyi dgyes mdzod rangs shing tshim par bskyed/ /bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam mkhar song
231a3(dkon brtsegs): ste khyod la bskor ba dang / /rtswa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la bskor ba dang / /lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa
231a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ /de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed gzi brjid tshe ldan pa/ /mi mchog 'khor
231a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig dang de bzhin gsher thub bcas ni bya ba mchod/ /mi mchog 'od srung dang ni shAkya'i mchog khyod de ring bdag gis mchod/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral
231a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa don du gnyer/ /sa ni grum zhing ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med gyur srid/ /su zhig byang chub tu ni sems nges lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa//
231a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni mchis ma lags/ /seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung zhig/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de
231b1(dkon brtsegs): nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs
231b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang / pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan
231b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che me tog sna tshogs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od ba la mthor zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
231b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod do/ /'khrul pa mi mnga' mi dngang mi snyengs bag mi tsha/ /mi zhum mi dman rab dgyes mi chags mi mnga' ba/ /sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba/ /rnam grol drang
231b5(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dogs bral zug rdu bral zhing dul la ma rig sel/ /'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel/ /gnas dang skyabs dang gling ma
231b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa mkhyen nas ni/ /gnas khyod skyabs khyod 'jig rten gsum po dag tu byung / /ji ltar lha yi tshogs rnams dad cing rab dga' ste/ /mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs
231b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor ba bgyid lags na/ /drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar deng 'gyur snyam/ /dgyes bskyed shing dbang drung gshegs mi snyengs bzhugs mdzod
232a1(dkon brtsegs): la| |bdud sde pham par mdzad de nyon mongs dra ba drol/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa/ /de ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ /
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi ched du khyed kyis bskal pa bye mang du/ /'gro ba de dag dgrol phyir dka' ba rnams kyang spyad/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te/ /byang chub mchog la reg|
232a3(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags/ / //bam po drug pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas byang chub snying po ga la
232a4(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste 'gro ba na/ lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa brda zhing 'dug ba des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong
232a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| lha rnams kyis bskul nas rtswa 'jam ba shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu dga' ba 'khyil ba/ g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha
232a6(dkon brtsegs): dog dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba spar gang blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa spar gang byang chub
232a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la byin te/ bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phyi
232b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtswa yang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /de ni rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te/ ji ltar kho bo bskal pa
232b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri shom pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ kho bos mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang
232b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di'i snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
232b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i
232b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab la dge slong stong thams pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
232b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag lung bstan to/ /de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyi du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems
232b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub
233a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por 'gro ba na seng+ge'i khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
233a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yan snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo
233a3(dkon brtsegs): gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba

233a5(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang / spos dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs
233a6(dkon brtsegs): pa khri dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / phye ma dang /

233b1(dkon brtsegs): dul zhi ba/ /dgyes shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma tho mi mnga' ba/ /skyon las grol ba'i ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal chen por bying
233b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mgon med 'gro 'di la/ /khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig /'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams spang ba'i phyir phyung ba/ /sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal

233b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du ni/ /bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba/ /drang srong chen po khyod
233b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyi/ /shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtswa spar gang khyer nas byang chub kyi snying

234a2(dkon brtsegs): che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer can/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu teg gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa/ ras
234a3(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshams so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas byang chub sems dpas seng+ge'i khri brgyad khri bzhi stong po

235a7(dkon brtsegs): par legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lhags par rig nas/ bdud sdig can de dag bzlog pa rnam pa bcu

235b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyed ni mi g.yon can dag gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni tshong pa lam rgyags
236a1(dkon brtsegs): mang po mes tshig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo bo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar
236a2(dkon brtsegs): do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyed ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khong du
