237a1(dkon brtsegs): dma' na shar phyogs mtho'o/ /lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho'o/ /byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho'o/ /mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o/ /dbus mtho na
237a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dma'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du sa g.yos pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'ur sgra
237a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtug cham gyi sgra chen po dang / gzung zhig pa dang / rgyob cig pa dang / chings shig pa dang / gsod cig pa'i sgra thos so/ /bdud kyi 'khor gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
237a4(dkon brtsegs): mthus steng gi bar snang la 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di thos so/ /drang srong nang na drang srong mchog/ 'di ni mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste/ /srog chags kun gyi skyabs yin gyi/ /'di la skyabs su
237a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar gyis/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ bdud kyi 'khor gyis sgra de thos pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas phub tu sa la 'gyel nas/ skyes bu chen po/
237a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdud sdig can lhag ma rnams ni dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'bros par 'dod
237a7(dkon brtsegs): na 'bros ma nus nas de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od byung ba dang / 'od des de dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rang rang gis gnas
237b1(dkon brtsegs): su dong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di bstan pa na bdud kyi 'khor de las gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus ni/ bla na
237b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
237b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /lha'i bu sngon sbyang ba byas pa bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// //zhi ba'i
237b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros/ de lta lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltar bdud 'dul ba tshang med pa dang ldan par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni bdud yong thams cad du ma 'ongs par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub
237b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems
237b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sa la 'dug par mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing gi
237b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po a shwad thar mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol du mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can du mthong ngo / /
238a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la'i srid tsam du mthong zhing / seng+ge'i khri shing ta la'i phyed tsam du mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing
238a2(dkon brtsegs): shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mthong zhing / seng+ge'i khri shing ta la phyed dang gnyis srid tsam du mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du mthong zhing /
238a3(dkon brtsegs): seng+ge'i khri dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong bar mthong ngo / /lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la brtson zhing 'dul bar mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni bdud gcig
238a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni bdud rgya chen por mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la brtse bar mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam
238a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing / nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng+ge'i khri la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong
238a6(dkon brtsegs): ste| zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'khod pa de dag gi yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni
238a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med par snang ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug pa dang / sngon mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag
238b1(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas lhags te mi 'jigs pa'i sgra brjod cing / shis pa'i sgra dang / bde ba'i sgra dang / kun dga' ba'i sgra dang / mgyogs
238b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dang / myur ba'i sgra dang / legs pa'i sgra dang / don yod pa'i sgra dang / dpa' ba'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / rgyas pa'i sgra dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra dang /
238b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gdung ba'i sgra dang / ma zhum pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang / spong ba don yod pa'i sgra dang / yid bde ba'i sgra dang / rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa rnam par rtse ba'i
238b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / phan pa'i sgra dang / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra brjod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang
238b5(dkon brtsegs): c hub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs 'byin pa rnam pa sna
238b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs brgya stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/ /bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/ des na
238b7(dkon brtsegs): p hyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la dbugs 'byin cing mchod
239a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la yang rjes su chags pa med la/ bdud kyi sde la yang khong khro ba med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes su
239a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
239a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang ci yang rung ste thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
239a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sku ma bsnyel tam zhes snyun gsol to/ /bsnyel ba mi mnga' bar byang chub bam/ rang byung du mngon par rdzogs
239a5(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub bam/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ kun tu ye shes kyis mngon
239a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ spyod yul ma 'dres pa dang ldan nam/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sam/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsabs sam/ chos thams cad la dbang
239a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ram zhes yongs su 'dri'o/ /de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so/ /sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de dag gis
239b1(dkon brtsegs): ni bya ba de mi shes so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzum par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su bstar te/ spyan mi 'dzum
239b2(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub kyi shing la yang gzigs so/ /lha'i bu brgya stong yang de la mchod de bstod do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do/ /bstod do/ /phyag 'tshal
239b3(dkon brtsegs): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa
239b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi lhung bzed rnams thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong bar gyur to/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal
239b5(dkon brtsegs): po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag go/ gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya nas rgyal po bye ba phrag bzhi brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs
239b6(dkon brtsegs): te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas lhung bzed bye ba phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin
239b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs nas rgyal po chen po re re yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed bzhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems
240a1(dkon brtsegs): te| de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin
240a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te/ de dag ni sngon
240a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bul lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas
240a4(dkon brtsegs): phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
240a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du sems
240a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi / sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang
240a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang
240b1(dkon brtsegs): chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gtsug phung can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom
240b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir sems can
240b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas chos
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste/ gang gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas bdag gis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin
240b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes smon lam btab pa yin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ tshangs pa gtsug phud can nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
240b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab kyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis gsol
240b7(dkon brtsegs): ba btab pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus kyang
241a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ba de'i tshe/
241a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis grong khyer wA ra NA si drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags su bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong yod pa/ rnam pa thams
241a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to/ /ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams
241a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcu dang / brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i
241a5(dkon brtsegs): khri bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bshams par gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po wA ra NA si ga la ba dang /
241a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags tshal ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas/ seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun du bstan to/ /de na re res kyang de
241a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur bar shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog
241b1(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas
241b2(dkon brtsegs): mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/
241b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam par gyur par gnas te
241b4(dkon brtsegs): lag mthil ltar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba pa'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'am/ mi'am /
241b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'am/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug
241b6(dkon brtsegs): gis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med cing gcig la gcig pha ma tsam du 'du shes te/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam
241b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu
242a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag lhags par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
242a2(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan
242a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa dbang
242a4(dkon brtsegs): che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs gang khyab par ma gyur pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha gzhag pa tsam yang med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de
242a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par mkhyen nas dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyod pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
242a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gang yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/
242a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun du shes te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
242b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag
242b2(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan
242b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du/ ko'u di n+ya/ mig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngal gyi sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thos so/ /bdag med pas 'dul
242b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so/ /stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong ngo zhes thos so/ /zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o zhes thos so/ /dben
242b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig dben pa'o zhes thos so/ /mi rtag pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so/ /gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig gnas med
242b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes thos so/ /sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes thos so/ /rmi lam lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos so/ /chu bla lta bus 'dul
242b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes thos so/ /mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so/ /brag ca lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag ca lta
243a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'o zhes thos so/ /de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med
243a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar thos so/ /rten cing
243a3(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so/ /mig la ji lta ba bzhin du de yid kyi bar du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos
243a4(dkon brtsegs): so| |de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes thos so/ /kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa dang /
243a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so/ /kha cig gis ni skye mched bdag med pa'o zhes thos so/ /kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ khams la mi rtag pa nyid du
243a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ phung po la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no/ /kha cig gis ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo/ /kha cig gis ni
243a7(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo/ /kha cig gis ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par grol lo/ /kha cig gis ni lam gyi sgras rnam par grol lo/ /kha cig gis ni dran pa nye bar bzhag
243b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni yang dag pa'i spong ba'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig
243b2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni stobs kyi gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni lam gyi gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi gtam du thos so/ /kha
243b3(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni lhag mthong gi gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni bden pa'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas
243b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so/ /kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi
243b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang
243b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de dag bgrang ba'i rtogs pas lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan
243b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud btul ba dang / bkod pa dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di
244a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sems can tshad med pa dag ni theg pa gsum
244a2(dkon brtsegs): la yongs su sman par byas so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
244a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de skad ces bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang rjes
244a4(dkon brtsegs): su mthun pa'am gcig tu lta'ang lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni zab lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste/
244a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gang bstan
244a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gis lus la gnas pa lags kyi/ 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
244a7(dkon brtsegs): pa| gsang pa pa'i bdag po/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i
244b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs
244b2(dkon brtsegs): pas byin gyis ma brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
244b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba shes par ram/ mnyan par ram/ bshad par nus pa su zhig yod/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de
244b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra
244b5(dkon brtsegs): bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
244b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan to/ /bsnyad do/ /rab tu bshad
244b7(dkon brtsegs): do| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur
245a1(dkon brtsegs): ro| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo bos bsgyel ba'am/ phrag ba la thogs par nus kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams
245a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram/ dad par ram/ yid ches par yang mi nus na/ blang bar ram/ kun chub par bya bar ram/ gzung bar ram/ sbyor bar bya ba lta smos
245a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur
245a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen
245a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
245a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/ gnyis la ma yin/ gsum la ma yin/ bzhi la ma yin/ lnga la ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
245a7(dkon brtsegs): po| sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
245b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nye bar zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la/ nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
245b2(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nye bar zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi
245b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun du rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /kun du rtog pa
245b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya
245b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rgyu dang dmigs pa nye
245b6(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /
245b7(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /ming dang gzugs
246a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chad pa dang / rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /chad pa dang / rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs
246a2(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na dmigs pa dang / rgyu dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni
246a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo / /'jig tshogs la lta ba nya bar zhi na lta ba thams cad nye bar zhi'o/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na smon pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o/ /'jig tshogs
246a4(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing gi rtsa ba bcad na yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u thams cad skam par
246a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes
246a6(dkon brtsegs): na nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par gyur na/ nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung
246a7(dkon brtsegs): ste| gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
246b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| zhi ba'i blo gros/ bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/ /sems can kun nas mi slong ba dang / srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs
246b2(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas so/ /lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ zhi ba'i
246b3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags te/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun
246b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang / zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
246b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang / zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/
246b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba de ni tshogs ma yin pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa/ rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/ de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun brtags pa'o/ /'byung ba ma yin zhing
246b7(dkon brtsegs): kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtag pa ma yin no/ /yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin
247a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa/ bslang ba ma yin pa/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang / bslang ba ma yin
247a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba gang nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/
247a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/ gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro/ /mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/
247a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ me ni rgyu la 'bar gyi/ rgyu med na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi/ dmigs pa med na zhi bar 'gyur ro// //bam po bdun
247a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |zhi ba'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la/ dge
247a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do/ /nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi bskyed la/ pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa yang bskyed do/ /bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs
247a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dmigs pa yang spong la/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos la dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa yang mi
247b1(dkon brtsegs): len la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa yang mi 'dor ro/ /stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog la/ sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang
247b2(dkon brtsegs): blta'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa la dbang thob ste/ ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la yang
247b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par sems la/ bsam bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo / /mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dmigs pa la yang 'jug la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa yang
247b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams 'og tu chud par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la yang spyod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa yang chud mi gson to/ /smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa yang rnam par
247b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong la/ khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa la yang mi smod do/ /shes rab dang thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par gyur te/ de mi sdug pa la dmigs
247b6(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sdug pa la sems gnas so/ /mi rtag pa la dmigs nas 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du sems gnas so/ /sdug bsngal la dmigs nas
247b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so/ /bdag med pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas so/ /'dod
248a1(dkon brtsegs): chags la dmigs nas sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ /zhe sdang la dmigs
248a2(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ /gti mug la dmigs nas sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams
248a3(dkon brtsegs): la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ /cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du
248a4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so/ /zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs
248a5(dkon brtsegs): nas rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems gnas so/ /gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so/ /gzugs la dmigs nas de bzhin
248a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /sgra la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /dri la dmigs nas de bzhin
248a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /ro la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar
248b1(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so/ /reg bya la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /chos la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
248b2(dkon brtsegs): sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /sbyin pa la dmigs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /tshul khrims la dmigs nas sangs
248b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnas so/ /bzod pa la dmigs nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i pags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so//
248b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus la dmigs nas sems can thams cad bsgral bar sems gnas so/ /bsam gtan la dmigs nas mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so/ /shes rab la dmigs
248b5(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun gcod par sems gnas so/ /byams pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i
248b6(dkon brtsegs): sems med par bya bar sems gnas so/ /snying rje la dmigs nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so/ /dga' ba la dmigs nas chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga'
248b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya bar sems gnas so/ /btang snyoms la dmigs nas sems can rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba la sbyar bar sems gnas so/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas
249a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so/ /ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so/ /'chal
249a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so/ /gnod sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang des pa la sems gnas
249a3(dkon brtsegs): so| |le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems gnas so/ /g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan
249a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /'chal ba'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs
249a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so/ /yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so/ /ngan 'gro ngan
249a6(dkon brtsegs): song yid la byas nas ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par sems gnas so/ /lha yid la byas nas 'byor pa thams cad mthar
249a7(dkon brtsegs): rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so/ /mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar sems gnas so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems
249b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so| / chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas slob dpon chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems gnas so/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par
249b2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar sems gnas so/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas smon pa dang / bsam
249b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/ /lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas lha thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la
249b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya bar sems gnas so/ /lus yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /ngag yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas
249b5(dkon brtsegs): so| |sems yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ /'dus byas la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par
249b6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar sems gnas so/ /'dus ma byas la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams
249b7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'o/ /chos thams
250a1(dkon brtsegs): cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
250a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na sa las skye ba ni skye ba ji ltar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
250a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
250a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gang ci yang rung ste de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa
250a5(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub
250a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod ba dang / le lo can de dag las
250a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag glen pa dang / rmongs pa de dag
250b1(dkon brtsegs): las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub
250b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag
250b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi bar mi 'gyur
250b4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o/ /sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba
250b5(dkon brtsegs): skye'o/ /sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang / dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o/ /sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo
250b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo skye'o/ /sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su bsrung ba'i blo skye'o/ /sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang
250b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gdams pa'i blo skye'o/ /sems can gang dag zur tsam gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas zab mo'i gtam brjod
251a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag bkri dgos
251a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam go rims su phab ste brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang / yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par bya'o/ /
251a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag zhi gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang
251a4(dkon brtsegs): dag tshul khrims la chags pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag thos pa la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i
251a5(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags
251a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i
251a7(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag gti mug chung ba de dag la thos pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par
251b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byams pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems
251b2(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag cha mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i gtam dang / byams pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
251b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag rjes su mthun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i sems kyi gtam brjod par
251b4(dkon brtsegs): bya| lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la dben pa'i gtam gyis rjes su mthun par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi gtam brjod
251b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag sma dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag
251b6(dkon brtsegs): par rgyun du bstan par bya'o/ /dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par mi bya'o/ /gang dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa
251b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan la phab pa bstan pa dang / dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang /
252a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /rnam par rtog pa la
252a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can smon lam la spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /phung po la gnas pa rnams la
252a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /skye mched la gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod
252a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /'dod pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i
252a5(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 'phags
252a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /lhas 'dul ba rnams la gcig tu
252a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga yi ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la
252b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa dang / de'i bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems dang po bskyed pa'i
252b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo
252b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub
252b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang ba med pa dang /
252b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang / shes rab yongs su dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod
252b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos ston pa yin/ legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
252b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas
253a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par
253a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de'i byang chub
253a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas
253a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bas/ de nas bcom ldan
253a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang /
253a6(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste/
253a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo
253b1(dkon brtsegs): gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ 'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra/ /zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par
253b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs/ /nyi ma lta bu mun pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /mi mchog ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /mos pa zhi gnas rdzing du rab tu bzhugs/ /thugs rje'i chu bo brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'khrungs//
253b3(dkon brtsegs): dran pas kha bye yon tan dri zhim ldan/ /bde gshegs pad+ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /dran pa gnod bzang zhi gnas mar lags te/ /snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sel mdzad/ /shes rab
253b4(dkon brtsegs): mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa/ /rab rib sel ba sred pa skam mdzad pa/ /'gro ba rgyas
253b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad mig ni sbyong mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs nyi ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ /khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na'ang lhang nge ba/ /drang srong chen po'i zhal
253b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'khor rnams la/ /mi mchog ci slad 'dir ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la
253b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje thogs nas bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
254a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i chos
254a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bskal pa bzang po de 'das nas de bzhin
254a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba
254a4(dkon brtsegs): der skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur/ don gyi tshul la yang 'jug par
254a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du yang bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla
254a6(dkon brtsegs): mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi gan na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang bskul bar 'gyur/ sems can
254a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
254b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rnam
254b2(dkon brtsegs): par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
254b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes
254b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de
254b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lha dang mi mang pos gang dang / byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po
254b6(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten
254b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de mig mang ris su byas pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ka tsa lan da ki ltar reg na bde ba/ dar gyi lnga ldi mang pos bres pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
255a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dan bsgrengs pas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog gis khebs par byas pa/ spos kyi snying po dam pas legs par bdugs pa/ steng gi
255a2(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ngan song dang / mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i
255a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod pa dang 'dra ba dang / yid la bsams pas zas dang / skom dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan grub cing legs par brgyan par 'gyur
255a4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang ba brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
255a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rung ste/ theg pa gnyis kyis ming yang mi grag
255a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems
255a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa'am/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'am/ tshul khrims nyams pa'am/ lta ba
255b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhar ba'am/ theng po'am/ sgur po'am/ gtum po'am/ dig pa'am/ mi srun pa'am/ kla klo na nam/ lkug pa'am/ grum po'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi
255b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad thub par 'gyur ro/ /lha
255b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di dang
255b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mang du yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sku las 'od phyung ba dang / de nas sems can de dag gis 'od de mthong nas 'di snyam du
255b5(dkon brtsegs): sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyi/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de na kha cig ni mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul
255b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de steng
255b7(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang la shing ta la 'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas/ skus khyab par mdzad de/ sems can
256a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/
256a2(dkon brtsegs): /de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'am/
256a3(dkon brtsegs): zlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do/ /sems can de dag thams cad ni dbang po rno ba mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi
256a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na nga yi ba med cing / yongs su
256a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon
256a6(dkon brtsegs): p a de lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye
256a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas pa dang / der lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
256b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid la bsams pas 'khor gyi khams su stan dang / zas dang / skom dang / ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas bcom
256b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod bab ces gsol pa dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo/ /bshos gsol nas slar bdud par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
256b3(dkon brtsegs): de gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi
256b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i khyab par 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po
256b5(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog
256b6(dkon brtsegs): cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/ /de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
256b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/
257a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ rdo rje de nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du 'phangs so/ /rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong
257a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /rol mo'i sil snyan brgya'i sgra yang byung ngo / /'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par
257a3(dkon brtsegs): yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag byung ngo / /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /
257a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zad chos kyi mdzod/ /chos rnams rab tu 'byed la mkhas pa 'gro don bzhed/ /chos la thugs ma zhum zhing rtag tu lhug par btang / /chos kyi rjes
257a5(dkon brtsegs): mthun chos bsgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag/ yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags/ /ye shes rgyun
257a6(dkon brtsegs): ni dus gsum rtag tu bsam 'tshal/ /chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag/ nyi ma las
257a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog/ tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba/ /dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
257b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni sku yang ston la sku dang ldan ma lags/ /khyod ni gsung yang brjod la sgra skad rtog mi mnga'/ /khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral/ /sems can thar par mdzad la
257b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'du shes bral/ /khyod ni gang dag chos ston thos nas ji lta bstan pa ltar/ /sgrub pa snying po snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs par/ /'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung
257b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ni/ /khyod kyi bka' drin lan ldon nam yang rdo mi thogs/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna
257b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi me tog gi phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro/ /me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum
257b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan par gyur cing / mig mang ris su gnas par kun du snang ngo / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
257b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras
257b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mod/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pas bdag lung bstan to/ /smras pa/ ci
258a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyed lung bstan/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thob par bya ba med par lung bstan pa thob po/ smras pa/ ci zhig thob pa med/ smras pa/ sems
258a2(dkon brtsegs): can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu thob pa med do/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams thob pa med do/ /dge ba dang / mi dge ba
258a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas
258a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob pa med do/ /smras pa/ gal te thob pa med
258a5(dkon brtsegs): na| 'dir ci zhig lung ston/ smras pa/ mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes lung bstan to/ /smras pa/ ye shes gang lung bstan/ smras pa/ gang gnyis
258a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu ma phye ba'o/ /smras pa/ gal te gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur na lung bstan pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir ye shes gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa de'i
258a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir gnyis su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o/ /smras pa/ gal te ye shes gnyis su med pas rab phye ba yin na lung ston pa ni su zhig/
258b1(dkon brtsegs): lung ni su la ston/ smras pa/ lung ston pa gang yin pa dang / su la lung ston pa de dag na mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'o/ /de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o/ /smras pa/ gsang ba
258b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po/ gnyis su med pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de la lung bstan du ci yod/ smras pa/ mtha' gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' de nyid du lung bstan pa'o//
258b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang la gnas na lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /sems can mtha' dang / srog dang / gang zag gi
258b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i

258b6(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas so/ /smras pa/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ shin tu ma skyes ma byung ba'i mtha'i gnas
258b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |smras pa/ ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha' ni gnas so/ /smras pa/ rnam par rig pas ci zhig rig par byed/ smras
259a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| gal te rnam par rig par byed na/ rnam par rig pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa thams
259a2(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par rig par mi byed do/ /smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes par byed/ smras pa/ gal te kun shes par byed na rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin
259a3(dkon brtsegs): te| gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do/ /smras pa/ kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe rnam par rig pa khas mi len
259a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |smras pa/ ji ltar na rnam par rig pa khas mi len/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug pa'o/ /smras pa/ ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug /smras pa/ gang
259a5(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe don la rton pa'o/ /smras pa/ don la rton pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don mi mthong ba'o/ /smras pa/ don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don
259a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o/ /smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang / don
259a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur ba de'i tshe chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur to/ /smras pa/ gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na de don du gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs
259b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu/ chos don du gnyer ba ni ci yang don du gnyer ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni chos ma yin te/ chos su mi rung ngo / /smras pa/ chos gang yin/ smras
259b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa'o/ /smras pa/ gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa de la chos gang yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la yi ge rnams kun du mi 'byung ba de
259b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid chos yin no/ /de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ su zhig bdag smra'o zhes smras pa de 'chal par smra ba'o/ /gang 'chal
259b4(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba de la chos med do/ /'dul ba med do/ /smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang chos gsung ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal bar gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i
259b5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs so/ /ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/ de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
259b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigs so/ /smras pa/ smras na nyes pa ci yod/ smras pa/ ngag gi las kyi nyes par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ ngag gi las las nyes pa ci zhig 'byung / smras
259b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| yi ge la sems pas bklags pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ nyes pa med pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang mi smra/ mi brjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do/ /rnam par
260a1(dkon brtsegs): rig pa med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o/ /gang bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang / gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de nyes pa med pa'o/ /smras pa/ nyes
260a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/ smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/ smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o/ /smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/
260a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ni rtsa ba'o/ /smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/ smras pa/ lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ba ni rtsa ba'o/ /
260a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ci zhig la lhag par dmigs/ smras pa/ gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams la lhag par dmigs so/ /
260a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gal te sred pa'i bag la nyal la lhag par mi dmigs pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de lta bas na sred pa la dmigs pa spang
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub
260a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag
260b1(dkon brtsegs): bo lag na rdo rje brang pa yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan
260b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs gcig/ nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs
260b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs shing dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par ci gnang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ lcang lo
260b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis te/ sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa/
260b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na/ yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /des na yang khro ba dang sdang
260b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde
260b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba
261a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos
261a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo / /de nas gsang ba pa'i
261a3(dkon brtsegs): b dag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba
261a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas lcang lo
261a5(dkon brtsegs): can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste/ rang gi gnas su phyin to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
261a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs
261a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas par 'gyur
261b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis mngon par shes te dus gcig cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
261b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa
261b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
261b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha dang mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i
261b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa mthong gi/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i
261b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams bkod par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
261b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas
262a1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi dbus na gnas par snang ngo / /'khor gyi khyams de yang
262a2(dkon brtsegs): yangs shing rgya che ste/ shar nub tu chur ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ sa gzhi ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rang bzhin
262a3(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa/ phyir ni a na da rnyil las byas pa/ zung gi phrugs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mas brgyan pa/ rgyan phreng sna tshogs du mas spras
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| ras bcos bu du ma bting ba/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma dbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga lding du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba du mas bkab pa/ pog phor du ma nas
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bdugs pa/ lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs bkram pa/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lus sim par byed pa/ sems dga' ba bskyed pa/ yon tan gyi
262a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ bsngags pa'i tshogs bstan pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsa bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer gyis
262a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba/ rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa mig mang ris su bris pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu dum bting ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra bas bres
262b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| bkod pa sngon ma mthong / ma thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo / /zhal zas ro bro ba brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so/ /seng ge'i khri sa la
262b2(dkon brtsegs): mi brten pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
262b3(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin
262b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsod pa mang po yang bshams nas
262b5(dkon brtsegs): nam nangs pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams
262b6(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gi de la khyod dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig/ lcang lo can
263a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed
263a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la yang / grogs po dag/ shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor
263a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gi/ de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang / sdang ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das
263a4(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ chos kyang nyon cig ces bsgo'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la
263a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la/ tshangs ris nas bzung ste 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na
263a6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyi/ khyod kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces spro na zhig/ yang / de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes te ji skad
263a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu des byas so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag bzang zhes bya ba la smras pa/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
263b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis song la/ sa bla ba'i lha rnams nas bzung ste bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
263b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyi/ khyed kyi nang
263b3(dkon brtsegs): nas su blta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yab/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzang gis byas so/ /de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam
263b4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis dpag tshad khri khor khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
263b5(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te/ nam nangs pa dang / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
263b6(dkon brtsegs): ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod bab pa gsol pa/ thub pa chen po dus 'di lags/ skyes bu gtso bo gshegs su gsol/ /
263b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol/ /thub pa chen po gdugs tshod bab/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegs su gsol/ /rkang gnyis
264a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gshegs su gsol/ /rkang gnyis cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol/ /tshul khrims pad+ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs/ /brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel/ /slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa/ /thub pa pad+ma gshegs su gsol/ /'phags pa'i bden par gnas bcas te/ /byams dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing / /bdag med pa yi
264a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra sgrogs pa/ rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol/ /khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran/ /byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/ /rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal ba sdong po
264a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab rgya chen zab pa po/ /ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing / /rnal 'byor pa yi tshong pas gtams/ /yon tan rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol/ /thugs
264a5(dkon brtsegs): rje dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa/ /shes rab 'od zer legs par brgyan/ /slob ma pad+ma kha 'byed pa/ /thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol/ /phas kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing /
264a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam thar la sogs sman tshogs can/ /slob dang mi slob ri dwags gtams/ /thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
264a7(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje'i gdugs tshod bab par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gdugs tshod bab kyi/ chos gos gyon la lhung bzed
264b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs shig/ zhag bdun byin gyis brlab pa byin gyis rlob la gtsug lag khang gi khang skyong skos shig/ de nas nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de
264b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar snang la dong ngo / /gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khrod du bzhugs nas
264b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang lhan gcig tu nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
264b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len/ 'od zer ni 'gyed/ me tog gi char ni
264b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs/ rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/ zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs
264b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam
264b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par
265a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal
265a2(dkon brtsegs): po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga'/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ni mtshungs/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ltar lha'i
265a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu

265b1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang bsgreng ngo / /rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong yang len to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug

265b4(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi bu'i mdun khang du bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshes chen po dal zhing mi drag la/ sems can thams cad la mi gnod par g.yos par
265b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /da nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas myur ba myur bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor
265b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
265b7(dkon brtsegs): te| ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
266a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /btsun mo'i 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das

266b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas par lhan gcig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khyams su spyan drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi brten pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi seng ge'i
266b4(dkon brtsegs): gdan ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang stan ci rigs pa dag la 'khod do/ /de nas gsang

267a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo / /de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/ 'on te gsang
