269b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bya ba'o/ /'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag
269b7(dkon brtsegs): gi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /de nas de dag snod du rung bar mkhyen nas zab

270a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam rab tu ston to/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i
270a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/ 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed
270a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i
270a5(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
270a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi
270a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags
270b1(dkon brtsegs): pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba
270b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre
270b3(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /de la
270b4(dkon brtsegs): don dam par ni 'byung ba'am/ 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po
270b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rgyu dang / rkyen las byung ba'o/ /'di la 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun du gti mug pas khams
270b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/ /yang dag pa
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa kun du gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med de/ gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug
271a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /der chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do/ /the tshom mi za'o/ /chos thams cad la chags pa
271a2(dkon brtsegs): med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags so/ /de mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par
271a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi chags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so/ /chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa
271a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so/ /grogs po dag/ de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par
271a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos
271a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsam par
271a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang /
271b1(dkon brtsegs): bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de na tshod gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas na tshod mdzes
271b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur tu rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / dge
271b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'thob bo/ /de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to/ /sgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig lhur len pa'i blo
271b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang / bkur sti
271b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to/ /bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to/ /de ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas
271b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos ston to/ /chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po thob bo/ /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed do/ /de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang / srog
271b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta ba yin/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / mgu sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / dgon pa dang / bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams
272a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin no/ /don la rton pa yin te/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba yin no/ /bdag
272a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ /bag yod pa lhur len pa
272a3(dkon brtsegs): yang yin te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po sdom pa'o/ /de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no/ /de gzugs
272a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang / snas dri rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis
272a5(dkon brtsegs): reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji
272a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga'
272a7(dkon brtsegs): ba sel ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dag/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba
272b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / yid kyis nyes
272b2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /grogs po dag /de ltar
272b3(dkon brtsegs): na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dad pa mang ba dang / rtag tu mthun pa dang /
272b4(dkon brtsegs): chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol tu ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te/ de'i sems nyes par
272b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la mi 'gro'o/ /'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te/ sangs
272b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam la gnas so/ /che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ che ba nyid thob nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
272b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin
273a1(dkon brtsegs): tu grub pa dang / bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i
273a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di ji ltar lhang nge ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ji
273a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams
273a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su bsrung ba dang / yul 'dor ba dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba la bsten pa dang / 'dod
273a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba'i rnams dang tshul bzhin ma yin
273a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu
273a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa nas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ su dad pa dang ldan
273b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang / dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o/ /
273b2(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o/ /dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi
273b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa
273b4(dkon brtsegs): des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ tshul bzhin sbyor ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes
273b5(dkon brtsegs): so| |gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so/ /de la yod pa ni gang / med pa ni gang zhe na/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do/ /
273b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la med pa gang zhe na/ log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ de ni med pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang las dang / rnam
273b7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa ni yod do/ /gang las de dang rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do/ /gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do/ /
274a1(dkon brtsegs): gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do/ /le lo can
274a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni byang chub med do/ /phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yod do/ /rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do/ /gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur
274a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do/ /rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do/ /
274a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yod do/ /rtag pa dang / brtan
274a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do/ /gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams
274a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de dag ni yod do/ /ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag med do/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /'du byed rnams med na rnam
274a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni med
274b1(dkon brtsegs): do| |ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do/ /ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de med do/ /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de
274b2(dkon brtsegs): ni yod do/ /skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de med do/ /reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /reg pa med na tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni med do/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis
274b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa zhes bya ba de yin yod do/ /tshor ba med na sred pa zhes bya ba de med do/ /sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de med do/ /len pa'i
274b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do/ /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ /srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni med
274b5(dkon brtsegs): do| |skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do/ /skye ba med na rga shi dang / mya ngan
274b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams med do/ /gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /sbyin pas
274b7(dkon brtsegs): dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do/ /tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do/ /tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do/ /thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /
275a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do/ /bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba
275a2(dkon brtsegs): ni med do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na/ nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni
275a3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni kun shes pa brda sprod pa med do/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do/ /gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song
275a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do/ /nang gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni med do/ /ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do/ /nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do/ /bdag gam/ sems
275a5(dkon brtsegs): can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ltar na bag yod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub
275a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang
275a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so/ /de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags so/ /med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags te/ sangs rgyas bcom
275b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus te/ chos kyi
275b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo bzhi rnam par bzhag go / bzhi gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams
275b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams
275b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni
275b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dwags
275b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dwags
275b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ltar na chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs
276a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
276a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong pa
276a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi ji ltar 'jig rten skyong bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces
276a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag /khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyongs shig /de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe
276a5(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma la mi 'phyo ba dang / chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang
276a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / tha ba'i tshig med de/ zher mi 'debs pa dang / tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/ gzhan mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa
276a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song ba ste/ grogs po dag /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar
276b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / thams
276b2(dkon brtsegs): cad du mthun par 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
276b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/ grogs po dag /chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar
276b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las kyi las 'di
276b5(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang /
276b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o/ /de bzhin du ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad la
276b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i ngag dang / yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang /
277a1(dkon brtsegs): bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang / gsum pa'o/ /rnyed pa
277a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos dang mthun pa'i chos kyis rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa'am/ lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
277a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rnyed pa mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid
277a4(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o/ /tshul
277a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims ma nyams pa/ skyon med pa/ 'dren ma ma yin pa/ bsra bsre ma yin pa rang dbang can/ ma 'gags pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
277a6(dkon brtsegs): p a mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul khrims
277a7(dkon brtsegs): mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / mgu bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
277b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'o/ /lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung
277b2(dkon brtsegs): ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus tshangs
277b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu lta ba mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid
277b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste/ grogs po dag /
277b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
277b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa spangs pas/ 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti
277b7(dkon brtsegs): mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ grogs po dag/ 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag
278a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha
278a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ste/ chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di
278a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ gya gyu med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/ grogs po dag/ chos gcig po
278a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ /grogs po dag /de lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten skyong bar byed de/ grogs po dag /khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas 'jig rten
278a5(dkon brtsegs): skyongs shig / 'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag
278a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig
278a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o/ /snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ngas klu'i
278b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po sogs ma med kyi gnas su gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ngas
278b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i
278b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tsog
278b4(dkon brtsegs): tsog por 'dug nas lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /'di lta ste/ a hu ya/ hu la bA tI/ hu la ra NA
278b5(dkon brtsegs): a gu hA/ tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/ ni Shu ra NA /k+Shu tA k+Sha ta/ k+Sha ya k+Sha ya/ a k+Sha ya sa mA/ sha ma ni ka rA/ ha hu la hu ba ti/ khi la ba ti/ ki na a b+hi Shi ta/ ni sa sa ra NI/ dza dza dza dza ma ti/ a ba drA/ ni bA
278b6(dkon brtsegs): trA| brta brta a nu sA nI/ b+hu tA nu/ smri ti hoHma nu ShA nu smri ti ho/ de bA nu smri ti ho/ nA gA nAM/ yak+Sha nAM/ g+ha na d+ha rbA nAM/ ki na na rA naM/ ma ho ra ga NAM/ swA stir b+ha ban+tu sarba satwA naM /
278b7(dkon brtsegs): b+hi ki ran tu mahA parba ta/ sam bya thA twa na/ d+ha ra ni/ gardza tu sa mu dra be ga/ i ti/ gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ /sa
279a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po yang rab tu 'khrugs so/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang 'dar phad phad nas
279a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par mdzad do/ /de na
279a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la ma reg tsam du nye bar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bsrung
279a4(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag la gnod lags so/ /bdag cag la rab tu gnod lags so/ /bdag cag 'dar phad phad
279a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags
279a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang / khyed kyang nam mkha' la gnas nas rab tu g.yos pa yin
279a7(dkon brtsegs): no| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems
279b1(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan to/ / //bam po dgu pa/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo
279b2(dkon brtsegs): rje'i sdes/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dra bas mngon par bkab nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
279b3(dkon brtsegs): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
279b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med
279b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byams pa chen po dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po dang / bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor
279b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum du yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang / bden
279b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam
280a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ste/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs
280a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems
280a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ byang
280a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab
280a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis brtan pa yin/ ye shes kyis brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin/ sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las
280a6(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba yin/ chos la mi rtag par mos pa yin/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid
280a7(dkon brtsegs): du shes pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas mi dngang mi skrag cing
280b1(dkon brtsegs): skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na bgyi ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
280b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ legs par bsgoms
280b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing nyams par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo yongs su bsgoms pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ tshangs pa'i bla ma
280b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyis rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thabs dang shes rab las nges par 'byung ba yin te/ gzhon
280b5(dkon brtsegs): nu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
280b6(dkon brtsegs): sgo du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi dbang po la
280b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang / skad thams cad kun du 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad pa bstan pa so so
281a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/ gzhon nu/ chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
281a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/ dgu
281a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang / phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos
281a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs dang / rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i stobs dang / 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs dang / sems can bsrung ba'i phyir
281a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / stobs bcu
281a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gzhon nu/ dgu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na
281a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag bzod pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
281b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grags par
281b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du na 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu

281b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bskul gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang / bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir
281b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang / kha ton byas pa de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo
281b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
282a1(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu le d+hi re/ ha ri ti/ a
282a2(dkon brtsegs): ku sha la k+Sha ye/ tsa le tsa la ba ti/ sA re/ k+Shu re/ k+Shan ti ba la/ k+She me/ shan ti ka re/ k+Sha me/ sha me/ hu lu/ a li khi/ khi ri kha ri/ A be sha ni sa ra Ne/ dza ye dza ya ba ti/ s+thi
282a3(dkon brtsegs): re a brte/ bi brte/ a brta ni/ me ti/ b+hu tA nA na/ sad dra he da mi/ da ma sa ma ban ne ta rne/ ta ra ya se swa yan/ swa sti de be b+h+yo/ nA ge b+h+yo/ yak+She b+h+yo/ gan d+ha rbe rA k+Sha se b+h+yo/ ma
282a4(dkon brtsegs): nu She b+h+yo/ a ma nu She b+h+yo swa stir b+ha ba tu swa dA mu kham/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/ /ri yi rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos/ /sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /chu yi rgyal
282a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyang 'khrugs/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/ /phas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod/ /chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus/ /chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs/ /
282a6(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni/ /lha tshogs kun tu dgar gyur nas/ /dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes/ /phan tshun du ni smra bar byed/ /stong gsum po yang rab tu
282a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ /'khor yang rab tu 'dar gyur nas/ /mi yi dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la/ /gtugs par byas te skyabs su dong / /de dag mi 'jigs der phyin nas/ /ston pas
282b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs pas na/ /dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas
282b2(dkon brtsegs): su zhag bdun 'das nas su/ sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas zhag bdun 'das te/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de
282b3(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i
282b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
282b5(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding du mas ni bskor/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod/ 'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/ /rol
282b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sil snyan ni len/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs
282b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen
283a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/ slar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
283a2(dkon brtsegs): la byon to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /bzhud pa dang / byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
283a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma
283a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rgyal
283a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
283a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
283b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'di na mdun khang na mchis na gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis te/ 'di skad ces mchi'o/ /yab/ bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po
283b2(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs zhes gda'o zhes mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam
283b3(dkon brtsegs): du bsams te/ gang gis slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang sems can yongs su
283b4(dkon brtsegs): smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas/ 'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i sems can de ni sems can gyi
283b5(dkon brtsegs): ris na gang yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
283b6(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i
284a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
284a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba
284a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul
284a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs
284a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas des na spobs pa 'di lta bu dang
284a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang
284a7(dkon brtsegs): ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/ tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam
284b1(dkon brtsegs): par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
284b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
284b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod de/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyis lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam
284b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig yang dag par ston pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stobs zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das
284b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka'
284b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa yang dag
284b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam du bdag bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan
285a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags
285a3(dkon brtsegs): te| bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
285a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches bde'o/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
285a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa de lta de ltar bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan 'das
285a6(dkon brtsegs): na slad kyis ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyis te/
285a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing sems
285b1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi don la brtson pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos tshad ma mchis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa
285b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid pa ni/ sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go /bcom
285b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni/ btang snyoms su ltung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'
285b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyi sems can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas par mi 'gyur
285b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'tshal
285b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni
285b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spyod yul
286a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
286a2(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen pos de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyis
286a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub
286a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par bya ste/ rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i/ gzhan gyi spyod yul la spyad par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
286a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ni/ 'di lta
286a6(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
286a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la/ khams gsum du yang mtshams sbyor ba dang / sel ba dang / sdud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
286b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad gsog pa la mkhas pa dang / zad pa yang shes la bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa
286b2(dkon brtsegs): la yang mkhas pa dang / skye ba med par yang rab tu rtogs la bsam bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sems can yang med la/ sems can yongs su smin par
286b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad dben par yang shes la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam
286b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par shes la mtshan dang dpe byad
286b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du
286b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyong la don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ci bya'o cog la
286b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mkhas la lus dang sems dben par dga' ba yang shes pa dang / chos bstan pa yang mi 'dor la smra ba la smad pa la mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan yang bskyed
287a1(dkon brtsegs): la bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar yang mi byed pa dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa yang shes la sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes
287a2(dkon brtsegs): su yang 'jug cing gtam yang dag par ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'byung ba med par yang shes la bsam bzhin du srid pa yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lhag
287a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang shes la 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
287a4(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi yul la blta ba la yang mkhas
287a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste| rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des/ bcom
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod las spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad
287a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs
287b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang bdag sems pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
287b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gnas gang lags pa dang / gzugs snang ba thams
287b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la mi sgrib pa dang / nam mkha'i spyod yul la sgrib pa ma mchis pas gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
287b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper
287b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi na/ gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug gi shing ljon pa'am/ sman gyi shing ljon pa'am/ tsher ma
287b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi shing ljon pa'am/ me tog gi shing ljon pa'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'am/ spos kyi shing ljon pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las rnam par 'phel
287b7(dkon brtsegs): yang nam mkha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag par yang mi 'gyur/ rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags
288a1(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams
288a2(dkon brtsegs): cad lags te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag
288a3(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni des mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi
288a4(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ zhugs ni rtswa'am nags tshal gang yang rung ste de la mi 'bros kyi/ de dag thams cad ni me sgron gsal
288a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'bar bar bgyid pas phan par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi me sgron 'bar bar bgyid pas chos thams cad ni byang chub sems
288a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ tshan po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis mi 'tshig /mtshon gyis mi khums/ dug gis
288a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gum ste/ de la pha rol gyis gnod pas mi tshugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyang / nyan thos dang 'dris
288b1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta
288b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni
288b3(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rin po che yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad
288b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas la/ dug thams cad kyang zhi
288b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa yang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'am/ rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams
288b6(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu mi gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs 'dis na chos thams cad byang chub
288b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de skad bstan pa na srog chags brgyad stong gis bla na med pa
289a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /rgyal
289a2(dkon brtsegs): po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' stobs zhes
289a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa'
289a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu bgos so/ /de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur
289a5(dkon brtsegs): byas so/ /dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
289a6(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gam/ 'on te yang ba zhig /gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs
289a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po bdog pa zhes bya snyam mo/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas rgyal po ma
289b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rdo rje 'di ni lci ba yang yin la/ yang ba yang yin no/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir na lci ba yin la/ ji ltar na yang ba yang yin//
289b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sems can nga rgyal can dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa/ snyems pa rnams yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir lci ba yin no/ /sems can nga rgyal med pa
289b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis pa rlabs nas rdo rje sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / de bzhag
289b4(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di
289b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan
289b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ rdo rje de stobs kyi shugs thams cad kyis bteg par bskyod na/ skra'i rtse mo cha tsam yang ba skyod pa'am/ bsgul ba ma nus nas de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo
289b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni tshan po chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang / ya lad ba skon pa'i
290a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che yang lag pa ya gcig gis bdeg pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa'am/ bsgul ba'i rdo yang ma
290a2(dkon brtsegs): thog na gdeg par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rdo rje 'di ni lci'i/ 'di la khyod
290a3(dkon brtsegs): yi ma chad cig / de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ko'u shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di
290a4(dkon brtsegs): nas theg cig / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sa rang gi stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / stobs kyi shugs thams cad bstan kyang rdo rje de bskyod
290a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ bsgul bar ma nus so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gang
290a6(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi bdag po thags bzang ris kyi shing rta dpag tshad bdun brgya pa drag tu mchi ba
290a7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dzin par rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje chung du 'di bskyod pa'am/ bsgul ba'i rngo mi thog pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
290b1(dkon brtsegs): ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka /rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/ 'di la nga'i byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /ko'u shi ka /'di ji
290b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lci ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ji tsam du lci ba ni dper bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom
290b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka /rdo rje 'di ni lci ba ste/ ko'u shi ka /gal te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi khor yug gi ri
290b4(dkon brtsegs): la bsnun na/ de yang / dper na/ phur ma sbar gang gtor ba bzhin du rnam par gtor te/ ko'u shi ka /rdo rje 'di'i stobs kyi shugs ni de tsam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
290b5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul
290b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te
290b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du/ rdo rje 'di gdeg par ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs
291a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rdo rje de la bzung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/ chu yang gnam
291a2(dkon brtsegs): du brgal zhing / rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa'am/ bsgul bar ma nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/
291a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na
291a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar dbang che bar grags la/ de ltar mthu che ba lags
291a5(dkon brtsegs): te| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go /bcom ldan 'das/ stong gsum
291a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang / dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig gis kar sha pa ne gcig mdzub mo'i rtse mos sgre bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis
291a7(dkon brtsegs): sgre bzlog go / bcom ldan 'das/ nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mchi ba yang bdag gis thogs par bgyid do/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa
291b1(dkon brtsegs): ya gcig gis blangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo de gnyis kyang btul to/ /bcom ldan
291b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du yang mchis/ bdag gis ri rab tsam gyi khams de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rdo rje 'di
291b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa'am/ bsgul ba'i rngo yang ma thog pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags
291b4(dkon brtsegs): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs
291b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi byin gyis brlabs 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mo'u 'gal gyi
291b6(dkon brtsegs): bu| sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa'am/ bsgul bar nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa'am/
291b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgul bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni stobs
292a1(dkon brtsegs): che ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab ji
292a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed yod pa de dag ri gcig tu gyur kyang de ni gdeg par nus kyi rdo rje 'di ni gdeg par mi nus so/ /de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom
292a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan
292a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pha ma las gyur pa lags sam/ 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
292a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ pha ma las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yang rung ste/ 'jug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do/ /
292a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na| lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos myos por 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
292a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis glang po che'i blta stangs kyis phyogs thams cad kun du gzigs te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i
292b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par
292b2(dkon brtsegs): byas nas sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te steng gi par snang du 'phangs nas des de bar snang la lan bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas par bzhag go / de nas
292b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba ba'i
292b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces
292b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob
292b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di la
292b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog ni yongs su gtong gi / dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa
293a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa
293a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bar bya bar spro ba dang / sems can dbul po
293a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rdo thal gyis skud pa dang / sems can rnams la kun du dga' bar 'gyur
293a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig sgrogs pa dang / sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba ngal ba chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang
293a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa la gnas shing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba
293a6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar
293a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bka' blo bde ba dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang /
293b1(dkon brtsegs): sems las su rung ba ste/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o/ /gsol pa/
293b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba ni du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems
293b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i tshe/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas
293b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes pa byed pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur te/ der
293b5(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / khyim bdag tshong nga dpon du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ bzhi po de dag
293b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba'o/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dad pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
293b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dad pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal
294a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| rgyal po chen po/ sbyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni longs spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal
294a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| rgyal po chen po/ thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni shes rab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
294a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
294a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni sems can rjes su bsrung ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ brtson
294a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi rgyu mthun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka'

294a7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po/ shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/
294b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni the tshom spong ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
294b2(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ni som nyi med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
294b3(dkon brtsegs): dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/

296a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol
296a4(dkon brtsegs): to| |ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par gsungs pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pa legs par bcas pa dang /
