296a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa bstan pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang / mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/
296a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dag
296b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par 'di ltar che zhing 'di ltar gya nom pa'i bstan pa 'di la brtson pa rnams la su zhig pa zlog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ spong bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/
296b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o/ /gang gi mthus bdag nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad las
296b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis sha dang / khrag gis kyang bka' drin glan pa'i rdo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi mthus pa dag
296b4(dkon brtsegs): gis bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang / chos snang ba chen po thob par bgyis pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes
296b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la yang bdag gis lan glan pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/ /tshangs par spyod 'di mtha' dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo zhes bgyi ba ni bcom
296b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o/ /ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //bam po bcu pa ste/ tha ma'o/ /
296b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang gi tshe
297a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mngon sum du bzhugs
297a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di kho po'i dpang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig sprul na/ kho bo'i sprul pa gzugs
297a3(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa/ rnam par rtsen pa tha dad pa yang de snyed de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ 'di ni sngon gyi dang ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o/ /de nas byang
297a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tham
297a5(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar
297a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
297a7(dkon brtsegs): zin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ yi ge gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsnyad pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma skyes pa/ zad par mi 'gyur ba/ nub par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /yi ge
297b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis don gang brjod pa'i don de yang nub par bya bar mi nus pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni nub par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i
297b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de la skye ba ci yang med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa de ni mi 'gag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di las dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang
297b3(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin 'di ni 'dug pa nyid do zhes gsungs te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par
297b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba yin no/ /gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal ba de dam pa'i chos yin no/ /dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de brtag par mi nus te/ des na dam
297b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag gang du go cha gyon/ smras pa/
297b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag ni chos thams cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad
297b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'gal ba de nyid dam pa'i chos so/ /smras pa/ ji ltar na chos dang 'gal ba yin/ smras pa/ yi ge dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/ chos dang ni nam yang 'gal
298a1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la gang dag mi 'gal ba de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang dag 'jig
298a2(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ yod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros/
298a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni stong pa nyid du smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/ /'jig rten ni rtag pa dang / bde ba
298a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag dang / bdag gir smra ba yin la/ de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang bdag gi med par smra ba yin te/
298a5(dkon brtsegs): des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/ /'jig rten ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la/ de ni rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro bas des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal
298a6(dkon brtsegs): lo| |'jig rten ni tshe 'di lhur len pa yin la/ de ni tshe rabs 'pho ba lhur len pa yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/ /'jig rten ni phung po dang /
298a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ des na 'jig rten thams cad
298b1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal lo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis na/ gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
298b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yongs su 'dzin te/ bdag yongs su mi 'dzin/ sems can yongs su mi 'dzin/ chos yongs su mi 'dzin to//
298b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ji ltar yongs su mi 'dzin/ smras pa/ bdag dben pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / chos dben pa ma yin pa
298b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'das pa dben pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba dben pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa dang / 'das pa dang /
298b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa ma yin pa dang / zhing dben pa dang / zhing dben pa ma yin
298b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos dben pa dang / chos dben pa ma yin pa gang de ltar chos rnams rjes su rtogs pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
298b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /gsang ba
299a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gang chos thams cad
299a2(dkon brtsegs): la mtshan ma dang spros par mi 'dzin pa dang / kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal bu bzang
299a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nye bar zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' lags so/ /bcom
299a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/ nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la gang dag
299a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye bar zhi ba lags te/ de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags/ mched pa ma lags/ 'bar bar bgyid pa ma
299a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /gang dag zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ ji ltar chos thams cad
299a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba de ltar 'dzin no/ /lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas dge slong stong ni sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
299b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ spobs pa 'di su'i yin/ smras pa/ spobs pa 'di ni su bag chags
299b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs pa dang / tshig gi lam thams cad med pa dang / don dam pa brjod du med pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yin no/ /smras pa/
299b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu/ spobs pa ji ltar skye/ smras pa/ spobs pa med pa dang / spobs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nying mtshams
299b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba med pa'i phyir/ spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spobs pa med pa'i tshig go /rigs kyi bu/ 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la 'di ni su
299b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o/ /'di ni su dmigs pa la
299b6(dkon brtsegs): yang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la yang mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o/ /'di ni su chos thams cad la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/
299b7(dkon brtsegs): de shes pas chos gang yang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o/ /'di ni su gnas pa med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang / chu bo las brgal ba
300a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i spobs pa'o/ /'di ni skye ba med pa la skyes pa dang / 'gog pa med la mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba'i spobs pa'i/ /de nas
300a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags
300a3(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i
300a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnams grangs 'di nyan par 'dod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba nas 'dir 'ongs so/ /zhi
300a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'dis ni chos kyi rnam grangs rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/ de 'dod na bskal pa brgya stong du thog pa med pa'i spobs
300a6(dkon brtsegs): pas bstan kyang 'di'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzang gi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
300a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
300b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni gang yi ge rnams la yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su
300b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i sgo'o/ /a zhes bya ba las byung ba'o/ /a zhes bya ba'i mtha'o/ /a zhes bya ba ni tshig gi las thams cad las byed do/ /a zhes
300b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni mi shes pa'o/ /rnam par mi shes pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya'o//
300b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ rjes su 'jug pa ni de la chos 'phra rab tsam yang zhugs pa med pa dang / byung ba med pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ yi ge de dag ni 'ga' zhig nas lhags nas khong
300b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do/ /yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin no/ /yi ge de dag ni byung nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no/ /yi ge de dag ni phan
300b6(dkon brtsegs): tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yin no/ /yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung / ma smras kyang rung ste/ zad par 'gyur ba'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /yi ge de dag ni chos
300b7(dkon brtsegs): she'am/ chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog go /yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa'am/ bkag pa med do/ /yi ge de dag ni sus kyang byas pa'am/ chud gzan pa
301a1(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ yi ge bgrang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba yang de bzhin no/ /sems bgrang ba ji ltar chos thams cad bgrang ba yang
301a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no/ /chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa yang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te/ bgrang ba med pa ni chos
301a3(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'o/ /ji ltar chos bgrang ba nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du/ a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa yang de lta bu ste/ bzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa/ skye ba med pa
301a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa'o/ /ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do/ /de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ su bgrang
301a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs ba rgyun gcad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so/ /des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su
301a6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs so/ /des ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag brjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam
301a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug par 'jug go / sems can rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
301b1(dkon brtsegs): ni sems kyis dri ma med pa yin no/ /bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no/ /sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags pa yin no/ /bsgrub pa la legs
301b2(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa yin no/ /shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no/ /bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin no/ /pha rol
301b3(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs byed rnams kyi mi 'dus pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin no/ /phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no/ /lus kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin no/ /
301b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no/ /spobs pa mi zad pa yin no/ /bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no/ /nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no/ /ye shes kyis
301b5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa yin no/ /blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no/ /thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi lhun po dang
301b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa yin no/ /'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi chos rnams la pad+ma dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas
301b7(dkon brtsegs): sa dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /
302a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa yin
302a2(dkon brtsegs): no| |nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /chos sngon du sgrogs pas
302a3(dkon brtsegs): 'brug dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /chos kyi char 'bebs pas char pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang
302a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa yin no/ /chos kyi rgyal srid byed pas rgyal po dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten skyong ba dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /lha dang mi rnams
302a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan du gyur pas brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang
302a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa yin no/ /'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag pas ri dwags spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma
302a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /bzo thams cad slob pas pha dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /chos rin po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /bsod
302b1(dkon brtsegs): nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no/ /mtshan rnams kyis klubs pa yin no/ /dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no/ /lta
302b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzhi yin no/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin
302b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur ba mi gdab pa yin no/ /lha rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin no/ /klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin
302b4(dkon brtsegs): no| |chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur ba yin no/ /sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba
302b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin no/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no/ /chos
302b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no/ /bzod pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no/ /brtson
302b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yin no/ /bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa yin no/ /shes rab yongs su dag pas
303a1(dkon brtsegs): blo legs par dkar ba yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no/ /bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
303a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no/ /dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /
303a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ gal te de bzhin gshegs
303a4(dkon brtsegs): pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong du rgyun du byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
303a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad pa ni
303a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/
303a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la kha dog med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs
303b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa dang / gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /gang la gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni brjod
303b2(dkon brtsegs): par nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni ma bsdus pa/ nga yi ba ma mchis pa dang /
303b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gang gis kyang nye bar sprad par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ gang gis kyang gsal ba ma lags pa ste/ 'di la brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar
303b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar gyur pa rnams la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di ni chab kyi phung po'i steng na gnas te/ de la mi gang zhig khron pa'am/ khron pa chen po rko ba de chab dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gang mi rko ba des ni mi rnyed pa lags so//
303b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes de la su zhig brtson par bgyid pa de ni ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ su brtson par mi bgyid pa
303b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni ye shes 'thob par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas/ byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rtag tu brtson pa dang brtson 'grus brtsam par
304a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /de ltar na de dag la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ skyes bu dmus long
304a2(dkon brtsegs): gis de las skyes pa'i gzugs rnams mi mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pas ldongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang de las skyes pa'i chos
304a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan yang snang ba ma mchis na mi mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
304a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gang dag lha'i mig dang ldan pa lags kyang de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag ma mchis na mos par mi 'gyur/ mthong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom
304a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ lha'i mig la snang bas bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba la yang dag par rjes
304a6(dkon brtsegs): su bstan mi 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mngal na mchis pa'i sems can ni mi gda' mi mthong yang skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub kyang mi mthong mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis kyang skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
304b1(dkon brtsegs): dper bgyi na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can la shing ljon pa gang skyes pa de ni bar ma dor chags pa'am/ skam par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i
304b2(dkon brtsegs): chos la sbyor ba la brtson pa gang gi shes pa skyes pa de yang mi 'jig cing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gang gi
304b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'khor lo sa bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba de'i tshe/ rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud
304b4(dkon brtsegs): med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub kyi sems skye ba
304b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe chos rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs 'byung bar 'gyur lags
304b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gang gi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba de'i tshe sems can rnams la de'i
304b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don
305a1(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang / don mthun pas sems can dag sdud pa de'i tshe sems can rnams la de tha dad pa ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
305a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gang gi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mdun khang na mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
305a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtam gyi slad du mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'i gtam ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan
305a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par 'gyur pa de'i tshe/ thog mar ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho
305a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ lhag pa'i
305a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / snying rje chen por thog mar gnas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gang gi tshe gdugs 'char ba de'i tshe/ ri gang dag mtho ba
305a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la thog mar 'od zer 'bab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thogs mar byung ba de'i tshe/ sems can gang
305b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dge ba'i tsab sbyangs pa de dag gis ye shes kyi snang ba de myong bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing
305b2(dkon brtsegs): gal pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad ni sas bzed de/ thams cad las bcud mnyam du gtang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gzungs thob pa'i byang chub
305b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos kyi bsam pa'i gtong bas sems chags pa ma mchis par gtong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rgyal po
305b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpe dgod pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i
305b5(dkon brtsegs): bu rtswa dang nags tshal ji snyed pa dang / ming gi brda dang / chos kyi brda dang / sgra'i brda dag ji snyed pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog gi brda dag ji snyed pa dang / sems can gyi sems
305b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa dang / ming dang gzugs rab tu brjod pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yongs su
305b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa zas skom ji snyed pa dang / lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i dpe dgod par bstan pa yang de snyed do/ /lha'i bu/ gzungs thong pa'i byang chub sems
306a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshig gang ci yang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa med do/ /gzugs su snang ba'am/ sgra'am/ dri'am/ ro'am/ reg bya'am/
306a2(dkon brtsegs): chos su snang ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de la gang snang bar mi 'gyur ba de med do/ /de la gzhan las thos pa la rag las pa'i spobs pa med do/ /gzhan gyi dor lta ba la rag
306a3(dkon brtsegs): las pa'i bstan pa med do/ /de mi zad pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / thams cad la 'jug pa'i rjes su sngo ba yin no/ /de la rgyun chad pa med
306a4(dkon brtsegs): do| |chags pa med do/ /lus lci ba med do/ /sems zhum pa med do/ /de sangs rgyas brgya stong gi spyan sngar ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gzungs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / spobs pa thob bo/ /de ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum
306a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing / bzlog par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de chags pa med pa gsum gyi rjes su sngo ba yin no/ /gsum gang zhe na/ bdag la chags
306a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / sems can la chags pa med pa dang / chos la chags pa med pa'o/ /yongs su dag pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings
306b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su dag pa'o/ /mi zad pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ chos mi zad
306b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / bstan pa mi zad pa'o/ /byin gyi rlabs gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ spobs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi don gyi byin rlabs dang / chos
306b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlabs so/ /dga' ba gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi dga' ba dang / shes rab kyi dga' ba dang / the tshom chad pas dga' ba'o/ /
306b4(dkon brtsegs): myur ba gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ dran pa myur ba dang / blo gros myur ba dang / rtogs pa myur pa'o/ /gzungs kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa
306b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas gzungs thob par gyur to/ /gzungs kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa'i mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
306b6(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad
306b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
307a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las chos sba ba dang / bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi
307a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag thos pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/
307a3(dkon brtsegs): de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad sba ba dang / bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag khyod kyis 'khor 'di la rjod cig/
307a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
307a5(dkon brtsegs): te| gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ya ma ti/ dza ya sha tru/ a le a ma le/ a lu li te/ ma me ma ma ma ti/ na ma san d+hi/ ud ta me/
307a6(dkon brtsegs): ud ta ma ti/ ud ta ra ni/ a re A ra ma ni/ A ri sha ma ni/ A mU le/ a mU la/ a ba dat+ti te/ mU la a nu ga te/ ad Te mad Ti mad Ti te A di mA Di/ mA Ti te/
307a7(dkon brtsegs): khu ru khu ru san d+hi/ d+harma a nu ga te/ d+harma dak+She d+ha rma pra be sha/ sa re sa re sa re a be d+he/ be d+ha san d+hi/ i hi e ha ni/ e ta dA nu ga ma/ bdud rnams tshar gcod pa mu
307b1(dkon brtsegs): stegs can rnams 'joms pa/ chos la gnod par sems pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba/ chos kyi tshul rnams 'bar bar byed pa/ chos smra ba
307b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun du bsrung ba/ mya ngan las 'das par 'dzud pa/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/ 'khor yang dag par 'jog pa chos nyan pa rnams la
307b3(dkon brtsegs): lus sbyin par byed pa/ yang dag par song ba rnams kyis bsams pa/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis blta ba/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / gsang
307b4(dkon brtsegs): sngags kyi mtshams 'gug pa/ brjod pa shes pa/ chad pa/ mi thul ba/ bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid du chud za bar ma gyur cig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang sngags
307b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhi 'di dag yongs su brjod ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
307b6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags nas lus btud te thal mo
307b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis chos smra ba su'i kha'i sgo nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byung ba de la rim
308a1(dkon brtsegs): gro bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi dpal ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzod
308a2(dkon brtsegs): par rngo ma thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sba bar bgyi'o/ /glags lta ba gzhan dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi'o/ /de nas
308a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bzhi kun tu gzigs te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dza ye dur dza ye/ dza ya ma ti /
308a4(dkon brtsegs): sha me sha tru nir g+hA ta ni/ a mU le/ mU la pa ri tshin ne/ mA rA sai n+ya bi trA sa ni/ mug te mug ta ba ti shud d+he/ a b+he d+he/ b+ha ya mo tsa ni/ ba ro ha ra ne/ tad de bi d+ye bid+ya
308a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rod ta me/ pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod pa/ /chos smra ba dag kun sdud pa/ /chos kyi mdzod ni kun bsrung ba/ /rig sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas gsungs/ /a ma a ma me
308a6(dkon brtsegs): ma me/ ma ma tshe de/ ar+the ar+tha ni/ sta ra Ne/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams smras pa'o/ /d+hI re/ d+hI ra ba ti/ gu ba te/ shu b+he shu b+ha ba ti/ sa me/ lha'i
308a7(dkon brtsegs): dpang po brgya byin 'dir dgug par byas pa'o/ /mai tri so ma ba ti/ k+ShA na ti/ kri pa ka ru No da hri te/ prI te/ u pe k+Sha sam pan te/ tshangs pa yang 'dir dgug par bya'o/ /
308b1(dkon brtsegs): a ra Te/ bi ra Ti/ kha khe a mU le/ mU la sho d+ha ni/ bdud ni tshur gcad bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags gzhi ni 'di dag smras/ /mdo sde legs par bshad pa 'di/ /mi yi
308b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang pos byin gyis brlabs/ /gang tshe shes par 'gyur ba ni/ /de yi tshe na spyod par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/ /sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /bdud rnams
308b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lhags gyur te/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 'di/ /gang dag lag tu mchi 'gyur ba/ /chos smra mkhas pa de dag ni/ /bdag cag rnams
308b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsrung bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin
308b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par gyis shig / byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i
308b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po/ ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa ma smad pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang
308b7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
309a1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/
309a2(dkon brtsegs): mthu che ba shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba dang / bden pas byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/ chos smra ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de las gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
309a3(dkon brtsegs): bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bskal pa phyed tshang bar rjes su bskor nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud bye ba
309a4(dkon brtsegs): khrag brgya 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ste/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
309a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de bzhugs sam/ 'on te yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/
309a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de ni shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya stong phrag
309a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khri thub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa
309b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag khros shing dngang bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis de dag btul/ legs
309b2(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su btul te/ de dag thams cad kyang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs
309b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rin chen zla ba de'i gsung rab la tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas byang chub tu nges par byung ste/ nga ni shes rab 'phags zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni bden
309b4(dkon brtsegs): pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar nged gnyis lhan cig tu mthun par bag yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag la bsti stang du byas so//
309b5(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas so/ /rim gror byas so/ /mchod par byas so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros/ de ltar na gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
309b6(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i phyir gces spras byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag/
309b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir gzung ba dang / yongs
310a1(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar khyed kyi nang nas su spro/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs
310a2(dkon brtsegs): te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
310a3(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog kyang spang bgyis la/ /rnam par smin la mi re bar/ /'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/ /rgyal po bzang la sogs pa
310a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lnga stong gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /
310a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can kun gyi don slad du/ /snying rje brtan par bskyed nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis gzungs zab pa yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar
310a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /nad kun las ni thar
310a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa/ /mdo 'di sman dang 'dra ba lags/ /ston pa lags par sems bskyed de/ /bdag cag gis kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan la 'das la gsang ba pa'i
310b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma
310b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /chos 'di yi ge ma mchis na/ /mi yi dbang pos thugs rje yis/ /yi ge rnams
310b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab bshad pa/ /da ni bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa gtsug phud can la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
310b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o/ /mchod pa'i las bla na med pa'o/ /bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par
310b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa
310b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| tshangs pa/ gsum po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bla na med pa'o/ /tshangs pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs
310b7(dkon brtsegs): pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa bskal pa'i bar du bstan du zin kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa/ de lta bas na de
311a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gis
311a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod par bya'o/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos kyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yongs su bzung na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
311a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni chos las
311a4(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba yin pas de chos kyis mchod par bya'i/ /zang zing gis ni ma yin no/ /dam pa'i chos kyi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang du mchog tu bshad do/ /
311a5(dkon brtsegs): dam par bshad do/ /phul du bshad do/ /tshangs pa/ ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na/ nga rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu skyes te/ rgyal po gzhon nu blo gros ldan zhes
311a6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur pa de na nga gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis thos nas bzung ba dang / nga sad nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis gter chen po
311a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig rnyed do snyam nas/ ngas gter chen po rnyed do zhes skad cher phyung ba dang / nga'i pha ma gnyis na re/ gzhon nu gter ga la yod ces zer ro/ /ngas pha ma gnyis la tshigs su
311b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gter chen rnams ni rgyal po dang / /rkun po me chus bslus pas zad par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos gter ni/ /bskal pa bye ba
311b2(dkon brtsegs): mang por chud mi za/ /sems can don brtson byang chub sems dang ni/ /tshul bzhin nyid kyis dben sems gang yin dang / /rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/ /yongs su
311b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu/ tshangs pa/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis ngas rmi lam du thos te/ tshangs pa/ ngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis sems can brgyad stong ni
311b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni bde 'gro thob par byas so/ /tshangs pa khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar gang dag thos pa la
311b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa dang / brtson nas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs pa la gnas nas kyang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa de dag gis gter chen po thob par de ltar rig par bya'o/ /tshangs
311b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| theg pa chen po la gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang / thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes pa ste/ gnyis
311b7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go/ tshangs pa/ de lta bas na chos kyi tshul 'di rgyun ma bcad cig /tshangs pa khyod kyis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang
312a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar gyis shig / tshangs pa/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur
312a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag de 'dra bar yongs su dag pa'i sems can du 'gyur na ni/ der khyod btang snyoms can du 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi dus 'di na su zhig nyin
312a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gam/ mtshan gcig dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mang gi /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su bskal pa brgya stong gis ni de lta ma yin no/ /tshangs pa/
312a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na khyod kyis dus ngan pa 'dir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus su bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
312a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i le'u klu'i gzungs chen po bstan pa 'di long zhig /gzung zhig /lhogs shig /
312a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab
312a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di skye bo phal pa la ma bshad cig / kun dga' bo/ sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams ni 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
312b1(dkon brtsegs): ni de tsam du mos par dka' ba/ de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /sems can gang dag cang shes pa sbyangs pa legs par byas pa chos 'di dag gi snod du gyur pa ma gtogs
312b2(dkon brtsegs): te| de dag ni chos kyi tshul gyi rgyud 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
312b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te/ mthu ci mchis pas rdo ci thog tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom
312b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong
312b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di dag thams cad ni khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa na phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba sha stag go /gsol
312b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na khyod kyis chos
312b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di lag na rdo rje'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig / 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /'di sangs rgyas kyi chos
313a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig / 'di bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /kun dga' bo/ /byang
313a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i skyes bu gang zag gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rin
313a3(dkon brtsegs): po cha thams cad kyis yongs su bkang nas sbyin pa byin te/ de'i rnam par smin pa la re babs gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bton te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis
313a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan
313a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u dang / bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla na med pa
313a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong ni bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la
313a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig rnam par dag go / dge slong stong drug brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag ni rab tu g.yos so/ /lha brgya stong dag
313b1(dkon brtsegs): gis ni rol mo'i sil snyan blangs shing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab ste/ 'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shin tu yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces kyang smras
313b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros dang / lha'i bu rgyal po bzang dang / rgyal po
313b3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
313b4(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //'phags pa dkon
313b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa
313b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad
313b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya swa pa na nir de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa
314a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
314a2(dkon brtsegs): n a| bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong drug khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
314a3(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ nyan thos chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas bcom
314a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
314a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags pa dang /
314a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu nas stong gsum gyi stong chen
314a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lhags pa'i dge slong ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
314b1(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus 'khor brgyad kyi gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom
314b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu
314b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' dang / rtogs dga' dang / bzang dga' dang / dpal bzang dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba
314b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
314b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
314b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam
314b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di ni sngon yang bshad la/ slad kyis kyang 'chad par 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
315a1(dkon brtsegs): la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du de yang dag par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
315a2(dkon brtsegs): y ongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
315a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa rgya chen po bskyed par 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid kyi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba na gzhan dag la rlom sems bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing / bde bas
315a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bag ma mchis par mi 'gyur la/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pas kyang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de
315a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes rab 'joms kyis lha'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab par rig cing / 'khor mtha'
315a6(dkon brtsegs): yas pa dag lhags par yang rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /yon tan brgyas gtams pa la 'di zhu lags/ /lha mi dga' mdzad pa la 'di
315a7(dkon brtsegs): zhu lags/ /bdud 'joms mdzad pa po la 'di zhu lags/ /skye mang sman pa'i mchog la 'di zhu lags/ /'khrul med gsung gis chos rnams ston mdzad cing //
315b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med/ /yid gnyis brgya stong rab tu gcod mdzad cing / /skye mang mig rtsol ba la 'di zhu lags/ /nyi ltar mnyam med mun pa sel mdzad cing //
315b2(dkon brtsegs): zla ltar yongs dag bsil ba'i 'od ldan pa/ /mi sdug stug la mi g.yo lhun 'dra zhing / /mtsho 'dra yon tan mchog la 'di zhu lags/ /dogs sa bzhin du nongs pa bgyis
315b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing / /chab ltar skye dgu'i dri ma sbyong bar mdzad/ /zhugs bzhin nyon mongs dra ba bsreg mdzad cing / /srid gsum 'khrul mi mnga' la 'di zhu lags/ /sman pa bzhin
315b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba gso mdzad cing / /rnam thos bu ltar sdug la nor sbyin mdzad/ /sprin bzhin skom pas gdungs pa zhi mdzad cing / /nges pa gsung mchog ston la 'di zhu lags/
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba zug rdu sdug bsngal nga rgyal bcas/ /tha ba nyon mongs dri bcas g.yo can dag /'dul mkhas bde dang bde ba stsol mdzad cing / /'gro bas dran bgyi ba la mchog 'di
315b6(dkon brtsegs): zhu| |'dzem dang snang ldan blo gros brtan ldan zhing / /rtogs dang dran ldan bla ma rnams kyis mchod/ /mnyam med tshul mi 'chos shing thugs mi gnas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra
315b7(dkon brtsegs): la mchog 'di zhu/ /skye dgu'i 'thab rtsod nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing / /rtag tu nges shing zhal bzang dga' bar mdzad/ /shin tu zhal 'dzum mnyen zhing byams pa'i thugs/ /srid
316a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pha rol gshegs la 'di zhu lags/ /sor bcu thal sbyar 'di yis bstod bgyis shing / /bde gshegs stobs bcu khyod la gsol 'debs
316a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi| |sems can rin chen de dag rnams kyi spyod/ /zhus pa bzhin du bka' stsol bshad du gsol/ /byang chub tshul gyi spyod de ci 'dra bas/ /thos nas lha mi tshogs kyang spyod 'gyur
316a3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ /'di ni skyes mchog lags zhes bdag cag gis/ /ji ltar 'tshal 'gyur mtshan ma bdag la gsungs/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
316a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes rab 'joms la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
316a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par shes par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /byang
316a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rdo rjes rab 'joms kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di
316a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms mtshan ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par rig par bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/
316b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdzes pas bka' stsol pa'i gzugs mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang cang mi gsung bar mthong ba dang /

316b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs la bzhen pa mthong ba dang / gzhan
316b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag rnyed pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra rnyed pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na sngon ma mthong ba'i
316b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten dag mthong ba dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rin po ches brgyan pa dag mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod

317a3(dkon brtsegs): gam/ me tog phreng ngam/ spos sam/ byug pa 'bul zhing / skud par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la na bza' dri ma can gsol pa mthong ba dang /

317a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod

318a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang du song bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag na bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag g.yang sa nas g.yang du lhung
318a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing bton pa med par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag bsad pa las btang bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag dgra'i nang na 'dug par

318a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra thos pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'i mdo sde'i sgra thos pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na chos smra ba'i dge slong
318a6(dkon brtsegs): che ge mo zhes bya ba rnams kyi ming thos pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag tshigs su bcad pa la spobs pa thob par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag mdo
318a7(dkon brtsegs): sde la spobs pa thob par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na chos kyi gter gyi sgra thos pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi de bzhin gshegs
318b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan thos pa dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rgya mtsho'i dbus na 'dug
318b2(dkon brtsegs): par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rin po che dag thu bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag ri rab kyi rtse mor son par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag ri la
318b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzeg par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag ri'i rtse mo na 'dug par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag shing ljon pa la 'dzeg par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang
318b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag glang po che'i gtso bo mthong ba dang / gzhan yang bdag glang po che'i gtso bo la zhon par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rta la zhon par kun tu shes pa dang / gzhan
318b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bdag bden pas byin gyi rlabs phyed par kun tu shes pa dang / gzhan yang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag mthong ba dang / gzhan yang me tog gi shing ljon pa dag mthong ba
318b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan yang sngon ma mthong ba'i grong khyer mthong ba dang / gzhan yang mtsho ma dros pa mthong ba dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu mthong ba dang / gzhan yang klu mthong ba dang / gzhan
318b7(dkon brtsegs): yang bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gzhan du song bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag gos dkar po gyon par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag gi mgo la rin po che'i phreng
319a1(dkon brtsegs): ba thogs par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag gi mgo la me tog gi phreng ba rgyan dang bcas pa thogs par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan
319a2(dkon brtsegs): yang bdag me tog sil ma dag bsrel bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rngo bo che brdung ba'am/ rol mo'i sgra gzhan dag 'byin par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang
319a3(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma spyang kis zin pa'am/ zla ba spyang kis zin par mthong ba dang / gzhan yang bdag mi gtsang bas 'bags par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rgyal por gyur par
319a4(dkon brtsegs): kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag rgyal po'i spyan snga'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am/ skye bo phal po che'i nang na 'dug par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag
319a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal na 'dug par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang sngon ma mthong ba'i gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ yul lam/ ljongs mthong ba dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na
319a6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs rnyed pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag skye bo phal po che la chos ston par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag grong gzhan du zhugs par kun du shes pa dang /
319a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bdag zam pa 'dogs par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag gru sbyor bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na sprin las 'brug sgra grag pa'am/
319b1(dkon brtsegs): glog 'byung bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na mtshon cha'am/ go cha rnyed pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na snod dag rnyed pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag sems
319b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la lam ston par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag skyed mos tshal du 'jug par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na lo tog phun sum tshogs
319b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba dang / gzhan yang bdag sems can nad pa rnams gso bar kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang bdag byang chub tu lung ston pa'i sgra thos pa dang / gzhan yang bdag
319b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun du shes pa dang / gzhan yang rmi lam na bum pa gang ba dag rnyed pa ste/ rdo rjes rab 'joms/ rmi lam gyi mtshan ma brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kun tu snang na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs
319b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bka' stsal pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de gal te gzungs thob par gyur pa zhig gam/ mngon par shes pa thob par gyur par zhig gam/ bden pa'i byin gyi
319b7(dkon brtsegs): rlabs grub par gyur pa zhig yin na ni sa brgyad par lung bstan par 'gyur bar blta'o/ /yon tan de dag 'thob tu nye ba zhig yin na ni sa dang po bdun po dag las sa gang yang rung
320a1(dkon brtsegs): bar lta'o/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ba mthong na/ byang chub sems
320a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' des ni chos la sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa yin pas/ des chos mnyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing kha ton la yang dag par brtson pa'i gang
320a3(dkon brtsegs): zag rnams la yang bde ba'i bsnyen bkur dag nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni sa dang po bdun po dag las sa
320a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang rung bar blta'o/ /de'i tshe sa dang po la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des sbyang ba'i phyir lo bdun du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
320a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gdon par bya'o/ /ci ste sa gnyis pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lo drug tu gdon par bya'o/ /ci ste sa gsum pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lo lngar gdon par
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /ci ste sa bzhi pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lo bzhir gdon par bya'o/ /ci ste sa lnga pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lo gsum du gdon par bya'o/ /ci ste sa
320a7(dkon brtsegs): drug pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lo gnyis su gdon par bya'o/ /ci ste sa bdun pa la gnas pa zhig yin na ni des lor gdon par bya'o/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms /gzhan
320b1(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa dbu dang zhabs su bcas par g.yogs par mthong na/ de ni sems can rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lta
320b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos nyan pa dang phral ba yin pas des zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyis spobs par byed pa'i dngos po nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par
320b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni las dang po par lta'o/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal phyir phyogs
320b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na/ des ni rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas shing / chos nyan pa rnams la yang sgrib pa bskyed pa yin pas/ des chos kyi khri stan bshams pa'i ngang tshul can du byas/ sems
320b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyang chos nyan du gzud par bya'o/ /des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni sa dang po bdun po dag las sa gang yang rung bar blta'o//

320b7(dkon brtsegs): po bar blta ste/ des ni chos smra ba'i spyod pa la dpyas byas pa yin pas des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos yig khang du mgo la mar me gzhag par bya zhing
321a1(dkon brtsegs): des zhes 'gras pa med pa'i sems su yang bya'o/ /de na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sa gzhan la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhig gis mtshan ma de lta bu mthong na ni bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs
321a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku tshon gyis bris pa mthong na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa lnga po gang yang rung ba dag tu blta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku bris pa la spos sam/ me tog dag gis mchod pa
321a4(dkon brtsegs): byed par kun tu shes na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa dang po par blta'o/ /ci ste thal mo sbyar ni sa gnyis par blta'o/ /ci ste bstod pa byed na ni sa gsum par blta'o/ /ci ste
321a5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal na ni sa bzhi par blta'o/ /ci ste skor ba byed na ni sa lnga par blta'o/ /des chos zab mo dag la bzod pa bskyed par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu lung
321a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhud pa mthong na des ni brnyas
321a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs byas shing kha ton dang lung phog pa yin pas des bag yod par brtson 'grus brtsam par bya zhing / yang dang yang du chos mnyan pa yang sbyin par bya/ de bzhin gshegs
321b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod rten dag kyang byi dor bya'o/ /des na de'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa gsum par blta'o/ /ci ste byang chub sems
321b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gzhan zhig 'gro ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na de la mtshan ma cir 'gyur zhe na/ gal te bkad sar 'gro la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na sa dang po bar blta'o/ /
321b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te gtsug lag khang du 'gro la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas gnyis par blta'o/ /gal te chos nyan du 'gro la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na sa gsum par blta'o//

322a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos smra ba la/ 'di ni shes bzhin du spyod pa ma yin no zhes smad pa yin pas des dge ba'i bshes gnyen

322a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa'i gtam ston pa thos na ni des dang po par blta'o/ /tshul khrims kyi gtam gyis ni sa gnyis par ro/ /bzod pa'i gtam gyis ni sa gsum
322a4(dkon brtsegs): par ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi gtam gyis ni sa bzhi par ro/ /bsam gtan gyi gtam gyis ni sa lnga par ro/ /shes rab kyi gtam gyis ni sa drug par ro/ /snying rje chen po'i

322a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i gtam gyis ni sa bcu par ro/ /rdo rjes rab 'joms/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs
322a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na byang chub sems dpa' de ni sa bdun pa la byang chub tu lung bstan par blta ste/ de ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gdu bar bya zhing chos zab mo la bzod pa dang
