400a2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi rnams/ /rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa ni/ /gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang / /bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags rnams/ /thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor
400a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ /bsod nams 'di yi char yang 'gyur ma yin/ /de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i/ /yon tan thos nas mgu dang dad skyes la/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog
400a4(dkon brtsegs): tu| |'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po bskyed/ /gang gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi/ /ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni/ /zhing mchog tha gru chen po de dag kun/ /cha dang dper
400a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can/ /de dag de bas bsod nams mang du 'gyur/ /don dam thob phyir dad pa rtsa ba ste/ /de lta bas na thos nas yid
400a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis sol/ /kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re yang sangs rgyas kyi
400a7(dkon brtsegs): z hing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod
400b1(dkon brtsegs): do/ /bsngags pa gsung ngo / /grags pa rab tu sgrogs so/ /yon tan brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos
400b2(dkon brtsegs): la/ thos nas kyang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa nas dad pa dang dga' ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
400b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa bskyed pa dang / byang
400b4(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
400b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong
400b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis tshe 'di nyid la de
400b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam du sems ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs
401a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang
401a2(dkon brtsegs): dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yid la byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du bskyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtod pa de dag 'chi ba'i
401a3(dkon brtsegs): dus nye bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng dang / zham 'bring ba
401a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting
401a5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin de dang / brjed pa med pa'i dran pas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems
401a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag 'chad pa na dga' ba 'thob cing sgyid lug pa med la/ mi 'gong mi zhum
401a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yi da la byed de/ 'dod pa yang bskyed na de dag rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de
401b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs
401b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang yongs su brjod do/ /
401b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yang gsung / bstod pa yang sgrogs so/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag de bzhin gshegs pa
401b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan
401b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dong ngo / /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing / tshigs su
401b6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la/ /phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing / /mtha' yas gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed nas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
401b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag lhags/ /de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ /dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te/ /tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ /mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor/ /
402a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la/ /phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang / /byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang
402a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag lhags/ /de dag spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa/ /dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te/ /tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ /mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab
402a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'thor/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis/ /mchod pa byas te dpag med 'od zhabs la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes
402a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'dzer/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems ni gzhal yas kyis/ /de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor nas/ /'dren pa de yi spyan sngar 'di skad du/ /bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur
402a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras/ /de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag /de tshe dpag tshad brgya pa'i gdugs gyur te/ /legs par brgyan zhing yu ba bkra bas mdzes/ /sangs rgyas sku la kun tu khebs
402a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du/ /bsnyen bkur byas nas dga' ste 'di skad du/ /gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa/ /sems can de dag rnyed pa legs
402a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed 'dzer/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na/ /bdag cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed/ /bskal pa stong du ston pas gang bsgrubs pa/ /rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni
402b1(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ltos/ /'od ni dpag med gzi brjid dpag med pa/ /sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun dpag med pa/ /byang chub sems dpas bskor zhing mdzes gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po
402b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog la ltos/ /de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas/ /'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug /de dag zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas byung ste/ /zhing stong bye ba dag ni khyab par mdzad/ /'od
402b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phro de dag thams cad slar log ste/ /'dren pa'i spyi gtsug der ni nub par gyur/ /de tshe 'od 'phro nub par gyur nas ni/ /lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed/ /de nas sangs rgyas sras po grags
402b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de langs te/ /gang slad 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags/ /sems can mang 'grol phan pa thugs
402b5(dkon brtsegs): brtse can/ /don dam mkhas pa de ni lung bstan gsol/ /gsung mchog yid du mchi ba de thos nas/ /sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams mang byang chub sems
402b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dag / sangs rgyas blta slad bde can 'dir mchi ba/ /de dag thos nas dga' ba cher bskyed de/ /myur du zhing 'di rnam par blta bar 'gyur/ /rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags par gyur nas
402b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang | |lha yi mig dang lha yi rna ba dang / /tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang / /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur du thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa/ /ngas ni sngon
403a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe smon lam 'di skad btab/ /sems can gang gis nga yi ming thos na/ /nga yi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog /nga yi smon lam bzang po de rdzogs pas/ /'jig
403a2(dkon brtsegs): rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'ong / /de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni/ /de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir/ /bdag gi zhing
403a3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di 'drar gyur pa dang / /bdag gi ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang / /sems can mang po grol bar bya 'dod pa/ /de ni myur du rings par la gor du/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams
403a4(dkon brtsegs): song la/ /'od dpag med kyi gan du song nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod pa gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi zhing mang song nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang la mchod bya ste/ /bde bar
403a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang / /dro khar bde ba can du slar yang 'ong // //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
403a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'phang du dpag tshad stong drug brgya yod pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dpag tshad brgyad brgya tshun
403a7(dkon brtsegs): chad du 'phyang ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ rtag tu lo ma chags pa/ rtag tu me tog chags pa/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya
403b1(dkon brtsegs): stong du ma yod pa/ lo ma tha dad pa/ me tog tha dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i
403b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po ches rnam par spras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gis shin tu rnam par spras pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa/ gser
403b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi skud pa 'chang ba/ se mo do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan phreng dang / do shal chig rkyang dang / mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig sngon po'i rgyan phreng dang / seng ge'i
403b4(dkon brtsegs): kha nas 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin po che thams cad dang / dung gis mngon par spras pa/ gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams
403b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bla rer bres pa/ chu srin dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / zla gam lta bus legs par brgyan pa/ nor bu 'khrol ba
403b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | gser dang rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub kyi shing de
403b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis bskyod na sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo/ de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag
404a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du rna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ /sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
404a2(dkon brtsegs): med| gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang mig nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ /kun
404a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo/ sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag
404a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can
404a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag la khyab par gyur ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos
404a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de nas bzung ste byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yeng par shes par bya'o/ /sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de
404a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs
404b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang / shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta ste/ sgra'i rjes su
404b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob bo/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang /
404b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon
404b4(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba la mngon
404b5(dkon brtsegs): par brtson pa sha stag go / kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang ba sha stag go /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od
404b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor yug tu snang bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs
404b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis ming ci zhes
405a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de gnyis la gcig gi ming ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
405a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /gcig gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo/ de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes
405a3(dkon brtsegs): so| |kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus yongs su rdzogs
405a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ dbang po rno ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ ma
405a5(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa/ dbang po mi g.yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yas pa mu med pa sha stag go /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de
405a6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'dra la ba/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas nam
405a7(dkon brtsegs): yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ gang dag dper na/ da ltar gyi nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag
405b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas bkrugs pa dag tu gnas par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs
405b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcig bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu dong nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de dag rnam pa 'di
405b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs
405b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod par bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems bskyed cing / ji ltar 'dod pa rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa
405b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog nas rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod
405b6(dkon brtsegs): pa byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med/ grangs med pa dag kyang bskyed cing gsog go /gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu lag pa nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na yang de
405b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ dri tha dad pa/ dri du ma yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas 'byung ste/ de dag gis skon bu'i me tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag
406a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/ /skon bu'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las
406a2(dkon brtsegs): nang gi chung du gang yin pa de yang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdugs su 'gyur te/ phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar snga mas la mi ltung ngo / /de na skon
406a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba yang yod/ dpag tshad sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yod/ steng gi bar
406a4(dkon brtsegs): snang la me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /de na gang dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed cing / sems dga'
406a5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la slar log
406a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon
406a7(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa byin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam 'byor zhing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /
406b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bsgoms pas smon lam btab pa 'grub pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
406b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' yang mi bskyed do/ /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
406b3(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba mi bskyed do/ /'gro ba na yang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i/ ltos pa dang bcas par ni ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dngos po yongs
406b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa dang / gnas kyi sems dang / sems de lta bu dag de dag la yod med do/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa de
406b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi 'du shes med/ 'thab pa med/ rtsod pa med/ mi mthun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med de/ de dag ni sems can

413a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal zhing rigs bzang po rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / khams kyi rgyal po'am/ gang gis khri mon de

413a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tshom du lhung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang /
413a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang / sems dang ba tsam des 'jig rten gyis khams bde ba can der skye yang pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung
413b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing brdzus te 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ pad+ma rnams kyi mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang du 'du shes shing gnas te/ bshang gci med/ mchil
413b2(dkon brtsegs): ma med/ snabs med/ yid dang mi mthun pa mi 'byung mod kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam
413b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pa dang / dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi/ sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag pad+ma'i mngal nas 'byung
413b4(dkon brtsegs): ste| de dag de nas byung yang steng ngam/ 'og gam/ thad kar byung ba mi shes so/ /mi pham pa/ 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i
413b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mang po grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tshom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrubs
413b6(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa la ltos/ mi pham pa/ the tshom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos/ mi pham pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag
413b7(dkon brtsegs): gis the tshom yongs su spangs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan
414a1(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya
414a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
414a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan nas ji snyed
414a4(dkon brtsegs): cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa
414a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog
414a6(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su 'grub na dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag
414a7(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gan
414b1(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams
414b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi
414b3(dkon brtsegs): sgron ma'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu zil gyis gnon pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu
414b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'od kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
414b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa seng ge'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
414b6(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
414b7(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' nyis khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal
415a1(dkon brtsegs): m tshan gyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa 'jug pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
415a2(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil ba bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu
415a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de
415a4(dkon brtsegs): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi pham pa/ rnam grangs de lta bus de bzhin gshegs
415a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag gi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de
415a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /mi pham pa/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
415a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag rnyed pa ji snyed cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la than sems dad pa gcig tsam
415b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dad pa mi phyed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi pham pa/ de lta bas na khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang
415b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang /
415b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /mi pham pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid zhag gcig tsam yang bzung zhing bcas te bklags
415b4(dkon brtsegs): shing kun chub par byas la/ bsam pa thag pa nas gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /tha na glegs bam la legs par bris te bcang bar bya zhing de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed
415b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la dgod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med
415b6(dkon brtsegs): de la blta ba dang / bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir stong
415b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las brgal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /thos nas kyang g.yor ma lhung ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su
416a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rlabs po che chen po brtsam par
416a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |tha na ba gcig 'jos pa de srid du yang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba de brgal nas kyang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig
416a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi pham pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di nyan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
416a4(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/
416a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur du bsgrub pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed
416a6(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu legs pa rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /
416a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / bsgom pa la dga' bar
416b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / tha na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no/ /mi pham pa/ de ltar na ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas
416b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ khyod kyang da the tshom med par brtson par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la som nyi ma za cig /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i btson rar
416b3(dkon brtsegs): chud da re/ mi pham pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /chos bstan pa rnyed par dka'o/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o/ /mi pham pa/ ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
416b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyed kyi/ da khyod kyis mngon par sbyor la sgrubs shig /mi pham pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa chen po bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson
416b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig /yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar gyur ta re/ de
416b6(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa/ /'di 'dra 'di dag thos mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo gang dag don grub pa/ /de dag gsung
416b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni/ /gus dang bcas pas chos thos pas/ /de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thob/ /lta ba can dang dman
417a1(dkon brtsegs): dang zhum rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus/ /gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyad la slob/ /dper na skyes
417a2(dkon brtsegs): bu yong ba mun khung na/ /lam yang mi shes bstan par ga la nus/ /de ltar nyan thos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes mi rtog sems can gzhan ci smos/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon
417a3(dkon brtsegs): tan mkhyen/ /lha klu lha min gnod sbyin nyan thos min/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin/ /gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs//
417a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rnam dag don la mkhas gyur te/ /de dag bskal pa 'am 'on te lhag par ni/ /sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan rjod byed kyang / /de dag rab tu mya ngan 'das gyur gyi/ /bskal pa bye ba mang
417a5(dkon brtsegs): por rab brjod kyang / /sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i yon tan ngo mtshar to/ /de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i rang bzhin mi/ /gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te/ /rgyal
417a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod/ /brgya lam na ni mi yi lus rnyed la/ /brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dad dang shes rab yun ring
417a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur| / de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus bskyed/ /gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni/ /bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub
417b1(dkon brtsegs): mos bskyed pa/ /de dag 'das pa'i dus na deng dang shes/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go /
417b2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pa'i zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni mi
417b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni sngon sems ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom
417b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de dag thams cad der
417b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
417b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag
417b7(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig
418a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ sngon gyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
418a2(dkon brtsegs): pa drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang kun du snang ngo / /me tog man da ra ba dag kyang sa la pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to/ /lha dang / mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par
418a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du yang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
418a4(dkon brtsegs): po mi pham pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
418a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas
418a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ le'u lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes ba sgyur cing zhus/
418a7(dkon brtsegs): te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //bkra shis//
